campaign.story:
Store it on your shelf or hang it on your wall!
5 wood easels with folding kickstand to organize your cards
Now included in all Premium Component packs
 DISCOUNTED PRICE | Get Canvas at 38% off MSRP, a savings of $17!
 EARLY DELIVERY | Receive your copy of the game one month before everyone else.
 KS EXCLUSIVES |  This campaign is your only chance to snag the Mini-Expansion, and 100 backers have the chance to get their name printed on every copy.
 GET INVOLVED | Support the campaign to help unlock more stretch goals and improve Canvas. Also, we read EVERY backer comment and listen to feedback. Your input is crucial for making Canvas the best game possible.

PLAY


Made for Tabletop Simulator by Pieter Schutz
On your turn, take a transparent card. The leftmost card is free. Each subsequent card costs an extra Inspiration Token. If the card you select contains tokens, take them.
Layer your transparent cards to reveal or cover different combinations of design element icons.
Create a painting by sleeving 3 transparent cards together. Then present your masterpiece.
Gain ribbons by matching the scoring cards. Try to match as many scoring cards as you can to gain the most points and win Best In Show!
We’re trying a new way to unlock stretch goals, which we're calling Ribbon Rewards. You can earn Ribbons with both monetary AND social support, so no matter your level of participation, your actions will directly contribute towards improving Canvas! The more Ribbons you earn, the more rewards are unlocked. Each of the following earns 1 Ribbon:
$1 Spent on Kickstarter
Fan Canvas on BoardGameGeek 
Like R2i Games on Facebook 
Follow R2i Games on Instagram 
Subscribe on YouTube 
Follow R2i Games on Twitter 
No additional shipping cost for Add-Ons.
To add items to your pledge, manually add the $ amount to your base pledge. After the campaign ends you will be asked which items you'd like to purchase during the survey.
Regardless of what or how much you order, this is your flat shipping cost. Shipping will be charged in the Pledge Manager following the campaign.
USA | $7
Canada | $9
 Asia, Australia, EU, NZ, UK | $12 
Other countries* | $25
*Does not ship to Brazil, Russia, South Africa, or Ukraine.
CUSTOMS FRIENDLY SHIPPING | We are working to provide custom free shipping to every country. However, due to the scope of worldwide shipping and the constant changing of international laws, it is possible that your package is diverted through customs. If this happens, please email us at roadtoinfamy@gmail.com with a picture of your customs receipt and we will fully reimburse the charges via paypal.
The Retailer Pledge level is reserved for US brick and mortar retail stores only. Pledging at this level grants access to the pledge manager where you will receive reduced retail pricing. Your pledge will be a credit towards your total order.
Retailer Terms PDF
Thanks for your support. If you have any questions or comments, you can send an email to Jeff & Andrew at roadtoinfamy@gmail.com
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
FULFILLMENT TIMELINE
Our previous games had an average delivery of 7 months after campaign, so we are confident Canvas can deliver in a similar time frame. The estimated delivery date for this project is December 2020, though delays are always a possibility. Due to the logistics of international shipping, some backers may receive their rewards sooner than others. 

LOST SHIPMENTS, LATE SURVEYS & REFUND POLICY
If your order is lost or returned due to unforeseen circumstances, we will attempt to reship your game one time, free of charge. If you provided incorrect shipping information, you will be responsible for the reshipment fee. If your order cannot be delivered, we will refund your order completely, including fees.

Reshipments and late survey shipments will all be sent out at the same time, about 3 months after the start of fulfillment to simplify the logistics and avoid errors resulting from sending numerous single orders.

This campaign will close 3 months after the start of fulfillment. If you do not provide shipping information by that time, we can not fulfill your order and your pledge will be kept as a donation to the campaign.

FINAL PRODUCT
The final look, materials and content of the rewards are subject to change and may differ from what is presented while the Kickstarter project was active.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
Canvas will be printed on high quality, durable components. The sleeves that come with the game are not only essential for gameplay, they also help increase the lifespan of the cards. Canvas was designed with future add-ons and expansions in mind. The art style and graphic design can handle different illustration and themes so that we can create future expansions that don't require reprinting all of the base game components.
Reusability and recyclability
Our manufacturer, PandaGM, will be producing replacement components so that damaged or missing pieces can be replaced with a small shipment instead of a second copy of the game, saving gas and materials. Canvas components are stored in reusable storage bags. The box efficiently holds all game pieces and add-ons without wasted space from a plastic insert.
Sustainable materials
The box and punchboard are made from 30% recycled materials for the ideal blend of durability and sustainability. The cards are made with materials from FSC certified sources. Components are printed with eco-friendly water-based ink and varnish. Our premium components are made from wood instead of plastic. The packing cartons are 100% recycled paper pulp.
Environmentally friendly factories
PandaGM recycles all plastic and paper waste. The factory is fully air-conditioned for worker comfort and has passed ISO worker health and safety standards, is BSCI social compliance certified, and follows the OHSAS requirements for occupational health and safety. Their project management and customer service teams all work remotely, which has a major impact on their carbon footprint.

updates.update_userinfo: Mini-Expansions For Charity / Expansion is Live
updates.update_content:
Canvas: Reflections is LIVE on Kickstarter
Hello again! We hope you've all been enjoying Canvas. If you'd like to join us on another Kickstarter adventure, head on over to the recently launched Canvas: Reflections page. The campaign funded in just 24 minutes and already over 6,000 backers have joined in!

Campaign Wrap-Up
With UK shipping underway, fulfillment is nearing the end! 52,145 rewards have now been shipped to backers all over the world. We owe a big thank you to our manufacturer, Panda Games Manufacturing, and our distributors Funagain, Surfin' Meeple, Aetherworks, and Zatu for overcoming challenges brought on by COVID and Brexit and bringing this project across the finish line. And thanks to all you backers for going on this journey with us. Your support and generosity are what allows Andrew and I to keep our dream jobs, and we are forever grateful for that.

We have some great news for UK backers!
We just received word that the freight shipment arrived today in the UK and will be at Zatu Fulfillment's warehouse on Monday. There are several projects in queue with this shipment, but they are going to ship Canvas first! Zatu will get to work picking, packing, and mailing out nearly 5,000 rewards. All orders are expected to be shipped out by the end of next week. Jeff and I want to thank everyone again for their patience as we, the freight forwarders, fulfillment team, and Zatu navigated this post-Brexit process.

Just a quick update for our UK backers:
Surfin Meeple just confirmed that the mountain of paperwork has been completed by both the fulfillment center and the UK customs office. The pick-up request has been submitted and the fulfillment center is just waiting on the go ahead from the UK customs office to ship everything to Zatu this week. Andrew and I know this UK delivery process has been frustratingly slow as the involved parties are still figuring out how to navigate through all this new legislation. We'll keep pushing for updates from the fulfillment center and post the next UK shipping update the moment we receive news. Hopefully we'll get a freight shipment and delivery timeline in the coming weeks.

Fulfillment Progress
EU: The EU fulfillment center has at least one more week of shipping games out the door. So, if you still don't have your tracking information or if you have not received your order, please allow at least another couple weeks while the games are in transit. 
UK: We received the following email from the distributor:"The EU depot continues working on transferring stock to Zatu for UK order fulfillment. This is a new process that they're still learning as they go, and it's unclear right now when they'll be able to send the transfer shipment, as there seems to be some sort of pending documentation approval on the Great Britain side of things. I'm trying to get more information on what this process actually looks like, but so far haven't been able to get much clarity. I'm continuing to push on it so I can hopefully give more informative updates."

Andrew and I are so happy to see that many of you have received your copies of Canvas! It's so cool to see all the community engagement, from the interpretive painting analyses on Instagram, to the solo challenges on Board Game Geek. One of my favorite posts was by @tabletoptale featuring an alternate setup using the easels to display the Scoring Cards, which I've recreated below in case anyone wants to try it.

It's happening! The fulfillment centers are working as fast as they can to pick, pack, and label your orders. Be aware that not everyone will receive their orders at the same time due to COVID safety precautions in place and over 50,000 rewards needing to be packed & shipped. We appreciate your patience as the fulfillment process is ongoing.
Shipping Timelines

Last Minute Address Changes
Wednesday, January 6th is the last possible day to change your shipping address. If you need to update it, email your new address to help@funagainlogistics.com.
Freight Shipping Update

Hello backers! We have some news to share about shipping.
But first, just a reminder that the below timelines are still estimations. We could wait until we receive firm dates, but then backers would feel left in the dark for a long period of time. Instead, we decided to give you all the information we have including our best guesses for delivery times. The ETA's are subject to change especially with the unpredictability of shipping during a holiday season with COVID protocols. So with that in mind, please set your expectations accordingly.
  Timelines

Bon Voyage! Canvas has set sail!
The pallets of games have been split into separate shipments and sent to each of our regional distributors. The delivery time for each region depends on the distance from the manufacturer in China. So from this point on, fulfillment progress will vary by location.
For North American Backers: The games are being loaded onto a boat called ATHOS, which will begin its long journey across the Pacific Ocean on November 18th. The ship should arrive at port on December 12. Then, the games will travel by truck to the distribution center, Funagain Logistics, in Indianapolis. Shipping to your house will likely begin in late-December.

project_data.project_name: Canvas

campaign.story:
#Growfromhome Movement is here! 
Pico will help you take your first steps into the magnificent world of growing plants. Easy and affordable, it ensures your plant journey is a success from the get-go. 

Know Your Pico  

As seen on 
Growing plants indoors around the year can be tough because they require lots of direct sunlight to thrive. Unfortunately, you can’t carry sunlight around to make sure your plants get the energy they deserve.
Thanks to Pico's multi-spectrum LED grow lights, giving your plant enough light isn’t a problem anymore; with it, you too can #GrowLikeaPro.
Powered by high-performance power-efficient LEDs from OSRAM, Pico provides all the necessary wavelengths of light to replace the sun completely, and allow you to grow plants all year round.
These powerful LEDs are chosen to support a wide range of plants and each color wavelength stimulates a specific biological function in plants.
 The LEDs are mounted on an easily-adjustable telescopic arm—because plants grow like crazy under our LEDs!      Reminiscent of a vintage radio antenna, it grows alongside your plants. As they extend upwards towards the light, extend Pico by up to a foot in height.
Power Pico through any USB Type-C cable. Included with your Pico are 2 cables to get you started, a short double-ended USB-C and a 3 meter (10’) super-long cable, along with magnetic organizer loops to help route the cable around fridges, windows or anything else magnetic. You may use any phone charger to power the Pico and the optional Pico-timer helps you automate it. 
The Aluminum heatsink makes the LED module rigid and lightweight; it also helps the LED chips last longer through its excellent heat dissipation.   
With its USB Type-C ports on both sides, you can chain up to 3 Picos together with a regular phone charger. Or build yourself an indoor jungle with 6 Picos powered through a 5V 3A charger! Just connect cables to either side, and each Pico will accept and pass-through power to the next one.

Regardless of how busy you are, Pico’s watering system makes sure your plants have as much water as they need—no more, no less—to sustain their health and beauty. All you need to do is top-up once a week. 
Watering too little can kill your plants, but so can too much. Getting it right takes time and experience. Not many of us have it. With Pico, that’s all taken care of for you!
The transparent window lets you know when it’s time to top up, typically once a week. Employing just capillary action and gravity, this design does not require any power supply or involve a motor or pumps. Your plants will also grow quicker and healthier due to root oxygenation from below, provided by the ventilation holes.
Plant pots take up space. They often can only be placed on flat surfaces by windows, which limits your options.
 With Pico, any place is a good place to grow some plants.
Work desk? Check. Fridge? Check. Wall? Check. Glass window, bathroom or even in a vehicle? Check, Check, Check. 
All 3 interchangeable mounts are included with your Pico.
Why several mounts?  Because when it comes to plants, you can't have too many and you might want them everywhere.

Anywhere is a good place to grow!
Grow anything you like 
No seed pods or subscription is involved and hence no recurring costs! Choose any seeds or growing medium of your choice.

Plants Make You Happy
Research has long suggested that indoor plants have a positive effect on the human mind and body. Studies show up to 60% reduction in depression, over 40% in anger, and just under 40% in anxiety. And at work, plants have increased the productivity of the office by up to 15%!
Plants have been proven to improve motivation and concentration, increase energy levels and decrease fatigue. And thanks to the transpiration and evaporation of water from plants, they increase the air quality and improve eye strain and skin health, and reduce the spread of airborne diseases.


Fresh Herbs Right In Your Kitchen 
Always wanted to have fresh edibles at hand? Imagine being able to throw your own homegrown, organic basil onto that bowl of pasta, or some fresh mint on your chicken. 
No more runs to the store for that missing ingredient, having to wash the pesticides and chemicals off of your leafy greens.
Growing edible plants can be a challenge. And while the end result is often worth it, it is a commitment most people find difficult to make. With Pico, we made sure to get all variables just right, so you can grow your favorite herbs at home without a hassle.

Yes, it's tough choosing a color.


 Stretch Goals unlocked!!
 Pico tool design credits to Daksh Savla

What’s Included
Pico comes assembled and ready to grow. Just take it out of the box, add some soil and water, and a few of your favorite seeds. Plug it in and watch your plants thrive!   
 What’s in the box
 1X Pico (preassembled and ready to use)
 1X Power cable (with magnetic cable organizer) (1 meter - 3' 3'')
 1X Daisy Chain Cable (3 meters - 9' 10'')
 3X Interchangeable mounts (magnetic, velcro, wall mount)

Who we are?
 We're Altifarm Enverde, a startup based across the USA and India. We strive to offer a healthier and wholesome way of life to all. We believe in Your Right to Grow, Anywhere, Anytime.
Our design team behind Pico
 Our first campaign was for Altifarm, which led us to switch from a Product Design studio into building home farming products. Altifarm is our flagship home farm with grow lights, greenhouse and mobility packs.
 Last year we launched Herbstation, a more sophisticated compact indoor farm. We've just completed fulfilment to our Kickstarter backers around the world.
Compared to the other two, Pico is a tiny—but only in size and not in ambition. Our goal with Pico is certainly big—to bring as many people as possible into the fold of Urban Farming. Now anyone can connect with nature and #GrowlikeaPro!
This year, we took Pico to CES 2020. We were excited by all the attention—no one could get enough of it!  

 Why Grow at home?  
Is it possible for a Pico to grow enough to replace grocery shopping? Certainly not! 
With our products Altifarm and Herbstation, we help people grow a substantial amount of fresh produce at home, with soil-based and soil-less methods. If anything, most items that are consumed fresh—the ingredients for salads, smoothies, soup, garnish—Altifarmers grow enough to meet a family's requirements when planned and rotated well
With Pico, our aim is to bring up the conversation around sustainable practices in food, and by participation, to have a greater appreciation for fresh produce among family members, including children. 
You don't need fertilizers or pesticides when you grow your food at home—no transportation, refrigeration, or even washing is required. And certainly, no single-use plastic packaging is involved.

 Timeline 
Product Development 
For business Inquiries: info@enverdeworld.com
Say Hi to us: hello@enverdeworld.com 
PICO is fully managed by The Crowdfunding Formula (TCF), the biggest digital marketing team responsible for the top crowdfunding campaigns. Join our campaigns in raising an average of $1.2M.
 More than $15,000,000 has been raised with Sprint's support.
Credits rolllll! a BIG thanks to:
- Rachit Vora from RV Studio, for brilliantly capturing our product with his lens, and Pratik Jain, for doing the same in 24 frames per second and for our 3rd campaign in a row.
- Our good friend, Rahul Agarwal, for his bounteous help and support in various forms, along with buddies Aatur Mehta and Jimit Kothari.
- Our mentors Jayant Murty and Kapil Kapoor, for their invaluable counsel, along with Asha Jadeja from MJF Foundation for her blessings and support.
- Prakash Bhimani, Deepak Balan, and Rajesh Ajith Sharma, for their abundant support and participation in our ventures and Vihang Dedhia for his sourcing prowess.
- Dipankar Roy, for his pertinent support and presence, along with Malay Damania, our support pillar.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We just concluded fulfillment for our Herbstation preorders to over 35 countries. We had our share of delays, mixups, and drama. The journey of a product from an idea to a product is a shelf, is arduous and challenging. This being our third global product launch we are even better learned and prepared.

Although Pico is production-ready with all tooling and manufacturing processes in place, we cannot ignore the elephant in the room - the COVID-19 crisis. While we do not have any external dependency on China or other markets and the entire product is manufactured in close vicinity, we have uncertainties staring at us. Once we are out of the stay at home deadlines, we would resume first batch production and get the early birds ready for shipment.

If there are any delays or roadblocks down the road, we assure you transparent and regular updates.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hi there :)
Hope everyone is doing great!
Life seems to be moving back to a normal-ish world for most people and everyone can’t wait to get back to how it used to be!
It's a different story in the Indian subcontinent where our manufacturing operations are - the pandemic is raging, many lives lost, many are suffering and our heart goes out to those struggling in these dark days of the pandemic. Our operations team is back to working from home.

updates.update_userinfo: Pico Max Is Now Live - [Kickstarter Exclusives Included] 🥳
updates.update_content:
Hey, How's everyone doing today?

This is a short update to announce the handing over the last batch of Kickstarter rewards to fulfillment partners. In the same breath, let's clarify that this doesn't mean all backers have received the packages.

updates.update_content:
Hello there 
Hope this finds you all safe and healthy. Since our last update from the first week of August, so much has happened. For us, it only feels like it's been a couple of weeks, but it wasn't- it was the most hectic month in our lives here. 
Apologies for the delay in the update release. We needed more time to share concrete progress in shipping to all. We were going through uncertainties with shipping readiness and the mode of shipping - which is still a bit hazy, as every day new information comes to life.

campaign.story:
The B2 is a reusable respirator that filters 99% of common contaminants and reduces filter cost and waste by half. Unlike existing consumer masks, the B2 features a flexible, patent-pending facepiece that provides superior protection and comfort. The B2 is the culmination of 4+ years of design and development, and is now ready to be mass produced.
Awards & Recognition
We are proud to announce that we've been selected as a PRI recipient from the Venn Foundation and as winners of the Protolabs Cool Idea Award. 
Drawbacks of Existing Masks
Each of these mask types suffers from the following three issues.
Poor face seals: Existing masks don't always achieve an adequate seal on the face, resulting in decreased protection [1]
High waste and cost: N95 masks are intended to be changed regularly, which is inconvenient and expensive in many use cases
Scalability of manufacturing: Face masks cannot be produced fast enough to meet the demands of both the health care system and general public
Is the B2 mask right for me?
The B2 Mask is designed to provide excellent protection to those who are most at risk from airborne contaminants, whether due to increased environmental exposure or preexisting conditions. People who may benefit from improved protection include:
 The B2 Mask is not recommended for those who need protection against oil-based particles or chemical vapors.
 B2 Mask: Superior Breathing Protection
The B2 Mask addresses the problems with existing masks and offers clear advantages over competitive options. These benefits include:
 Comfortable, Airtight Seal: Flexible facepiece achieves Fit Factor above 100
 High-Efficiency Filters: 99% protection from contaminants down to .1 micron
 Reduced Cost & Waste: Scalable filter technology reduces waste and cost
 Durable, Reusable Design: Easily cleanable design provides years of use
PLAY

Comfortable, Airtight Seal
The B2's patent-pending facepiece provides excellent comfort and protection compared to existing face masks. The facepiece is constructed from FDA-approved materials, folds in half for easy storage, and can accommodate a wide range of face shapes and sizes because of its flex-hinge design.
High-Efficiency Filters
The B2 Mask uses the latest advances in filter technology that provides 99% filtration against a range of airborne contaminants down to .1 micron.
 Particle Filtration Efficiency*: >99.5% at 32 LPM – tested according in accordance to TSI8130 NaCl .1 micron particle size
* Due to supply chain shortages, our 1st generation filters will not include melt-blown polypropylene. This does not compromise filtration level except for extended use in industrial settings. Refer to the following section regarding filter change frequency.
In addition to providing stellar protection, the B2's filters are easy load with a simple twist-to-lock filter cap.
Reduced Filter Cost and Waste
B2 Mask uses the smallest, most affordable high-efficiency filters on the market. During normal use, the B2 filters offer 40-50 hours of protection before filtration efficiency starts to drop. How often you change them filters depends on how you use your B2 Mask. See the recommendations below:
 Low use (occasional use while going out in public): Change every 2-3 weeks
 Medium use (wearing consistently over the course of a week): Change weekly
 High use (wearing for multiple hours a day):  Change daily for best protection
Every B2 comes pre-packaged with 10 filters, or five filter changes (2 filters/change). You can purchase additional filters at the end of the campaign starting at $14 or only $2.30/month for 6 months of protection for standard users.
The B2's filters are small and can be produced more rapidly than N95 masks. This means the B2 can scale to meet the demand of people around the world in search of high-quality breathing protection.
Durable, Reusable Design
The B2 Mask is designed to provide years of comfortable, sustainable protection. The B2's facepiece is constructed from durable materials and is easy to clean by hand or in a dishwasher. The overlay can be cleaned by hand or in the washing machine for easy maintenance. 
Testing & Regulatory Details
The B2 Mask is designed to offer best-in-class protection for daily use. Our team is working with 3rd-party experts to test and validate the two critical facets of mask protection: filtration efficacy and anthropometric fit factor.
Filter Testing 
We've selected a high-efficiency, electrostatically charged filter media that removes >99% of particulate matter down to .1 micron. The material has been tested for particulate filtration efficiency at Superior Felt and Filtration and at Nelson Labs.
Fit Factor Testing
A well maintained face seal is critical to achieving high levels of protection. Initial tests using the FDA-approved Portacount 8030 system showed the B2 Mask had an average Fit Factor over 100 - the level required for NIOSH certification. Breathe99 is partnering with leading human factors design firm Anthrotech to conduct additional face fit testing with 25 participants that fill the NIOSH panel for face shape and head size 
Regulatory Approval
We have designed the B2 Mask to comply with NIOSH N99 standards per 42 CFR Part 84, but the B2 Mask has not yet gone through the regulatory approval process with either NIOSH or the FDA. In the short term, Breathe99 will work to receive through the FDA to receive Emergency Use Authorization (EUA).
 A note for international backers: Due to longer shipping times, we anticipate you will receive B2 Mask in July (barring any unforeseen delays with international shipping).
Stretch Goals
It is through your support - both backing and sharing our campaign - that we can release additional colors for the B2, introduce a travel case, and bring a kids size B2 to market.
 $50k: Second color (Shipping in July/August)
 $100k: Third color (Shipping in July/August)
 $250k: Travel case
 $500k: B2 Mask - Kids Edition
 $750k: All backers gets 10 additional filters per mask for free
NOTE: New colors for B2 Mask will ship in August due to additional lead-time for sourcing color-matched fabrics and plastic colorants.
Breathe99: Yesterday
The idea for a protective, lightweight, and stylish mask first took shape almost 6 years ago, while Max - our CEO and mechanical engineer - was living in Singapore.
Since then we've gone through hundreds of sketched concepts, several major prototype iterations, and validated our design with quantitative flow testing. The result is a design ready to ramp up in production very quickly and bring high-quality protection to people around the world.
Breathe99: Today
Now we’re a group of engineers and designers with a passion for public health and technology. Our team has over 10 years of experience in the medical device industry, and our advisers add extensive knowledge and experience in product development, atmospheric science, and business strategy.
Max Bock-Aronson - CEO, Mechanical Engineer
Coleman Rollins - Full-Stack Engineer
Julia Duvall - Product Designer
Prashan Subasinghe - Mechanical Engineer
Derek Mathers -  Sales & Business Development
Emma Gavala - Marketing & Business Development
Healthy Together: The Breathe99 Mission
Our mission is to make the highest quality public health products available to everyone. We believe that each of us plays a vital role in protecting our neighbors and communities, and that it is through collaborative action we can create a healthier, more equitable world. 
Key Partners
We've partnered with industry-leading experts in molding, filtration technology,  and soft goods design and production. Each of these key partners are based in the US and are either ISO 13485 or ISO 9001:2015 certified. Partnering with these businesses ensures we can ramp up quickly and deliver the highest quality product on-time to our backers.
We also have partnered with other leading groups including the Venn Foundation, Anthrotech, and Worrell Design to ensure we are achieving the highest of quality as we seek to further our social mission of making high-quality public health products available to all.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Manufacturing & Overmold Complexity

While the B2 mask is an incredibly simple product to use, the facepiece involves a complicated overmolding manufacturing process. Our design has been evaluated and approved by material and process experts, and our manufacturing partners are ISO 9001:2015 certified for quality management. Still, this does not eliminate the risks associated with transferring to manufacturing, especially with the speed with which we're trying to move.

Regulatory Approval

The B2 Mask is not yet FDA or NIOSH approved. We have completed bench testing for all relevant aspects of the B2 Mask, yet there are still risks. We are committed to pursuing all relevant certifications - including N99 certification from NIOSH - but working through these certification processes can take time. In the meantime, Breathe99 will pursue the FDA's Emergency Use Authorization (EUA).

Shipping & Logistics

The B2 Mask is a global product that needs a global distribution network. This is why we’re partnering with established 3rd Party Logistics group with experience shipping to consumers around the world.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
The B2 Mask is constructed from tough, durable materials to ensure years of daily use.

Additionally, we're working with ISO-certified manufacturing partners who will sample and test the B2 to guarantee the highest quality product.
Reusability and recyclability
The B2 reduces filter waste and associated packaging by as much as 50% compared to alternative options.

We are also committed to minimizing environmental impact throughout our supply chain, including the use of packaging made from recycled post-consumer waste.
Sustainable materials
Breathe99 is committed to constructing the B2 Mask from sustainable materials whenever possible.
Environmentally friendly factories
At Breathe99 we are committed to working with manufacturing partners who share our sustainable values.
Sustainable Distribution
Whenever possible, we will offer carbon-neutral shipping to our users. As our fulfillment partnerships grow, we plan to support energy and cost-saving changes to the facilities that house and store Breathe99 products.

First B2 Masks Shipped!

This is Max writing to you again to provide updates on manufacturing for B2 Mask. We’ve made great progress and still anticipate shipping our first units in June.
Shipping Details
We are currently targeting June 29th / 30th to ship our first units of B2 Mask. Our MN-based factory is awaiting delivery of several items including consumer packaging and the quick start guide that’s included in the box. We expect to receive these remaining items by the end of next week.

campaign.story:
It is ultra strong. 
It is ultra stylish.  
It is ultra stretchable.  
And it's better for the planet. 
In addition to being stylish AirBag™ is an environmentally conscious product too. We don't want to be just carbon neutral, we want to be carbon positive. We will offset carbon emissions of manufacturing AirBags™ and shipping will be carbon neutral whenever feasible, subject to regional availability. 
Further to that, for every bag sold we will help protect a slice of precious wildlife habitat through the World Land Trust's 'Buy An Acre' scheme, best represented by their patron Sir David Attenborough. The World Land Trust is an international conservation organisation that takes direct action to save rainforest and other biologically important lands. Every backer will receive a card detailing how exactly we helped and we will quantify their personal share. It means you could learn that by buying AirBag™ you saved 3 trees, 1/2 of a chimp and around 55 caterpillars! How cool is that?!
The more you buy - the more rainforest we save together - the more Air to breathe!       
All pledges come with free shipping. Shipping logistics will be optimised with the aim to ensure no US or European customers will be taxed or charged extra VAT. Please note customers with shipping address other than in the EU and US will be responsible for duty, VAT and other fees applicable to the their location. We ship plastic free and carbon neutral.
Design credits
Icons made by Darius Dan, Smashicons, itim2101, photo3idea-studio, smalllikeart, monkik, Good Ware and Freepik from www.flaticon.com
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Manufacturing
We have developed dozens of prototypes of AirBag™, both in-house and with several manufacturers based in Asia and Europe. Having been able to compare a diverse range of pros and cons, we have chosen an experienced, reliable, top quality manufacturer based in the EU and we've agreed on all key terms with them such as lead times, minimum order quantities, terms of quality assurance and pricing. 
We are, however, not dependant on one manufacturer and we have a sound contingency plan. There might be no planet B, but we definitely have Plan B should there be a delay. 

Shipping
Our ultimate goal is to ensure that no US and EU based backer pays any import duties, taxes or other charges on top of their pledge. We have found a fulfilment partner who will help us deliver on that goal.

Timing
Our timeline published above includes some leeway for unexpected events, except COVID-19 and any other force majeure.

COVID-19
Our delivery schedule assumes manufacturing capability of our supplier currently affected by COVID-19 delays returns back to normal by mid-May. We will be closely monitoring the situation and provide you with regular updates.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
AirBag™ has been designed to last a lifetime. We've intentionally chosen a more expensive manufacturer because we want to be 100% sure that we offer quality to support our claim. We've chosen a special, high-strength and durability material and added ripstop technology to make it significantly less prone to ripping and tearing.
Reusability and recyclability
AirBag™ is made from partially recycled material and it is fully recyclable (at least in the EU and UK).
Environmentally friendly factories
We have compared a number of factories in Asia and Europe and the decision is to proceed with a factory in the EU, which meets a number of criteria from carbon offsetting, fair wages, meeting EU environmental standards etc.
Sustainable Distribution
Whenever available, shipping will be carbon neutral (currently we can guarantee this for customers in the EU and we'll be aiming for the same for orders from the USA as a matter of priority). All shipping will be 100% plastic free.
Something else
For every bag sold we will help protect a slice of precious wildlife habitat through the World Land Trust's 'Buy An Acre' scheme, best represented by their patron Sir David Attenborough. The World Land Trust is an international conservation organisation that takes direct action to save rainforest and other biologically important lands. Every backer will receive a card detailing how exactly we helped and we will quantify their personal share. It means you could learn that by buying AirBag™ you saved 3 trees, 1/2 of a chimp and around 55 caterpillars. How cool is that?!

The more you buy - the more rainforest we save together - the more Air to breathe!

updates.update_content:
Hi Fam!
Hope you are good and safe.🩺 Progress update on the manufacturing process. Due to the second outbreak and toughening up of rules, the production had to break for a while. This caused a great deal of anxiety to the team🥺 as we quickly had to replace the manufacturer. The good news is that we managed to do that at the end and the production has currently resumed though after losing money and time. So please accept our sincere apologies. We are currently trying to push for before the end of the year-delivery. On the bright side - once the production is finally over, shipping should be fast to make up for lost time.🏃🏻‍♂️
Kind regards,

Hi fam!👋🏻
Many thanks for submitting your surveys.👍🏻 Another reminder for those of you who still are behind the schedule - please ‘hurry up Cinderella!’, the surveys will be closing TODAY, 15 September, @23:59GMT.⏰
Keep rocking!🤘🏻

Dear fam! Hope you have been all keeping well.😷
The time has come for us to gather your colour preferences and mailing addresses!🪂 Check your inboxes. You should all have received those long-awaited surveys by now. Should anything change, you will still have the possibility to update your shipping address until September 15. 🗓
Lots of love

Hey guys!👋
Long time no see (yes, we know, so sorry!). No, still no trips to the Carribbeans but rather lots of work to start manufacturing. 💪 
We are talking to the manufacturer and we are discussing the quote based on the number of rewards and a few other points.

updates.update_userinfo: Working hard to move from production planning to manufacturing!
updates.update_content:
Guys and girls, ladies and gents you absolutely rock! 🤘🏻
Mega thanks to all of 1,097 of you, who supported AirBag™, donated your hard-earned cash and made this project a reality.💰You are our true inspiration and you keep us moving every single day! You can imagine how fast we are running around the block now to make sure the production will start on time! Please watch this space for further updates on our sprint!🏃🏻
Thank you from the entire MindBoxx team!❤️

Dear AirBag Tribe,
You have been simply PHENOMENAL for the last 27 days. It is incredible to see so many people care this much about the planet and all things sustainable. So thanks to all 1,037 of you.🤘🏻(and to those who will join later).
We’ve still got last couple of days to go. So if you want to upgrade your pledge or buy an extra bag for mama with 40% OFF retail price, it is your last chance! (you’ve been w.a.r.n.e.d!🔫). Otherwise we still love you unconditionally you know.🕺🏻

updates.update_userinfo: FINAL CHANCE to grab more AirBags!!!🏃🏻
updates.update_content:
Hi AirBag Fam!👋
Designers, programmers, fashionistas or simply nerds, whoever you are - you are OUR TRIBE, dear Kickstarter community! Your insane curiosity and passion for all things next keep us going every day. So THANK YOU for being part of this journey and getting AirBag 1,171% funded.🚀
Forever grateful we decided to extend our EarlyBird rewards. 🦆So there is still some space to push as we have additional 24 hours of Early Bird bonanza left. campaign.story:
We design and make amazing candles that burn like no other.
At Spiral Light Candles we believe candles should not only burn clean and smell great, they should also be fun to watch. Our unique, patented, two-candles-in-one design started with the idea that you could create a candle without the wasted wax left over from burning traditional candles. The idea is simple. Why not move the wick from the center of the candle out to the outer edge? Now you’re burning the side of the candle that normally ends up in the garbage. As the candle burns, the sides flow into the middle leaving you with a cozy, wood wick candle at the end.
We started Spiral Light in our garage in 2017.  The demand for candles has grown faster than we could ever have imagined possible. This leaves us with no choice but to seek out a new, larger facility and create custom machines to help make enough candles to keep up with demand.  This Kickstarter campaign means we don't need to "sell out" to investors or handcuff ourselves to big banks/venture capital firms. This enables us to continue focusing on independent retailers and resisting the demands to put our candles in big box stores or on Amazon. Don't get us wrong, we like our "Prime" too. We just also like shopping local and our candles give stores an exclusive product they can sell without fear of being undercut.
To find out more about us and to try some for yourself, click Back This Project. Or read on to hear more of our story.

PLAY





 Unique Design:
Spiral Light's unique design burns in a circle for the first three hours, filing in its hollow core. This is our "Party Trick!"
Long Burning Time:
When the hollow center is completely filled and the spiral portion burns out, you're left with a wood wick candle that you can enjoy for over 40 hours. That's the "Real" candle.
 Clean Burning: 
What's the recipe for a clean burning candle? It's a highly refined, food-grade, edible (please don't eat it) wax perfectly matched to the right sized, 100% cotton wick. It is phthalate-free scent oils mixed with vegetable-based colorants finished off with a locally sourced, softwood wick.
Great Scents:
We work hard to make sure every candle smells great. It starts with a bit of an obsession, add a little love and just a touch of family disagreement and voila, you have our candle scents. Seriously, we work with some of the best scent companies in the United States to bring you great smelling candles without the nasty chemicals.
Handcrafted in the U.S.A
Unlike a lot of candles, ours are all made in the United States from raw materials sourced right here in the U.S.  While we've been able to modify equipment to help us pour our candles faster, everyone of our candles is still hand-manufactured by our family and employees in our facility in Minnesota.


We could have just been happy that one of our candles actually worked and set off to make a million of them but we didn't.  We have three different sizes and burn times so that everyone can afford to try a Spiral Light and make them their favorite "go-to" gift item.

We can climb the highest mountain and scream out all the great things about Spiral Light Candles. But, in the end, we are only as good as what our backers think.  We know we have a great product that people will love but it sure is nice to see it in writing.

Loyal to the Local Store
If we had a dollar for every time someone asked us when we are going to "Sell out" to the big candle industry or show up on Shark Tank, we wouldn't need to look for backers. We are driven to remain the champions of smaller, independent retailers across the Country. We can do this without investors, without big box stores and without Amazon. Just our family, our friends and our backers making a great product for great people.
Manufacturing Capacity
Our Existing Factory  
When we started this adventure just over two years ago, we took a huge leap of faith and built out our current 2,500 square feet manufacturing space and small retail store. While it served us well at the time, It's already too small.

The New Space
This is the new home of Spiral Light Candles. At almost 8,000 square feet, we now have the space necessary to grow.  We need your help to bring in the new equipment and hire the people that will help us keep up with the growing demand.

Not sure how this whole Kickstarter thing works? Read on.
To help us get the new factory up and running, you must become a "backer" of this Kickstarter project. To do that, you pick a reward tier to support the campaign - you will essentially be pre-ordering one of our candles or candle packages. In exchange for your support, you will get a special backer discount and deals that will not be offered anywhere else. 
Shipping is expected to start in September of 2020, and your payment/credit card will not be charged until the campaign is over, which is May 5th, 2020. 
If you would like to add something additional to your reward that is not listed above, you can do so by using the Add-On Menu below. Any item (or combination of items) below can be added to your pledge by manually increasing your pledge amount after you choose a reward level. 
Confused? Send us a message - we would love to help!
 We hit our goal! Thanks to your amazing support we hit it in less than a week. Thank you so much. To celebrate we have unlocked two additional bonus rewards. 

Enjoy them on the patio
Working from home? Perfect time for a Spiral Light
Popcorn, a puzzle and a Spiral Light. The perfect stay at home survival kit!
Get Your Project Funded Today!
Get Cash Back on the Projects You Love!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
As with any Kickstarter project, there are certain risks and challenges must be overcome to produce a fantastic product for you. The good news is we have been making these candles for well over two years. We don't need your help to make a candle, we need your help to grow into a national brand without selling out to the big box stores or venture capitalists. While the ongoing Covid-19 pandemic has created a complicated environment for a lot of small businesses, we have managed to stay lean throughout our entire growth spurt. We do this by paying for everything we use upfront and we have managed to stay debt free through it all. We will survive and with your support we will use this time to grow stronger.
 
Your help ensures that we can grow to meet the demand necessary to stay independent and to continue to sell our super cool candles through independent retailers without the need to sell out. 

A lot of Kickstarter projects get tripped up during the shipping and fulfillment stage. Believe me, after this last Holiday season we've got this covered. We have the right tools and people in place to make it work.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
Our candles are by nature a consumable item. We do however get our long burn time by utilizing an extremely hard wax.
Reusability and recyclability
Our unique candle design was invented with very idea that we could completely use all the wax that is normally wasted in a traditional candle. When burned correctly there should be nothing to throw away except a tiny sliver of wax and a recyclable steel clip. With no jar, there is no glass to dispose of and the light-weight, hollow design means our shipping impact is less than half of traditional candles.

We package all our candles in recyclable kraft paper boxes and ship only using starch based packing peanuts and 100% recyclable shipping boxes.
Sustainable materials
Our packaging is manufactured from recycled kraft paper. Our wax is a food grade, edible wax (please don't eat it). We use 100% sustainable cotton and softwood wicks. Our scent oils and vegetable based colorants contain no toxins nor California Prop 65 components providing a very clean burning final product.
Environmentally friendly factories
Our new space uses LED lighting and a brand new and efficient heating and cooling system. We work very hard to keep our footprint as small as possible.
Sustainable Distribution
Our light-weight, hollow design means our shipping impact is less than half of traditional candles. We also spend the extra money to package all our candles in recyclable kraft paper boxes and ship using starch based packing peanuts.

updates.update_userinfo: Trying to clear up any missing Items
updates.update_content:
Hello all.
It had been a crazy winter and covid continues to slow us all down as one of the machines we ordered back in June is finally arriving next week. 
Everything we know of had been fullfilled. We have tried to get any remaining items taken care of that might still be missing for various reasons. In more than one case we have sent multiple replacements to people and have delivery confirmations but yet they are coming up missing. In other cases it is a broken candle or a missing survey. In many cases we have had to send items later than we wanted because we can only make one scent per day and it takes us 20 days to get back around to a missing candle.

updates.update_userinfo: For those who have not completed a survey.
updates.update_content:
DIDN'T DO THE SURVEY?
We have gotten a few emails from those who say they have not completed a survey or gotten an email to verify their address. We did not use Kickstarter for fulfillment. Their interface is not conducive for shipping large number of rewards. We used a system called CrowdOx and if you did not respond to the survey it has send emails every month since June. 
If you need to complete a survey, follow this link. We cannot ship anything to you without this survey being  completed. https://app.crowdox.com/retrieve/spirallight/stop-burning-boring-candles

WE MADE IT.
Its been a marathon of sorts with lots of little bumps in the road along the way but we have finally crossed the finish line. Today the last international rewards went out. While there are a couple still hanging out there waiting for their shipping addresses, we can count them on one hand. There have been a few shipping mistakes that we have corrected and we had the one large batch of shipments go out without their "extras" but we were able to isolate it and get the extras out yesterday.

updates.update_userinfo: Shipping continues but not without small issues.
updates.update_content:
HELLO ALL.
We continue to ship about 200-250 packages a day. You will get an email with tracking when your order ships. We expect to have them all boxed and out the door by this weekend.

AN ISSUE HAS ARISEN.

HELLO ALL.
It's been 12 days since our last update and I wanted to get back to everyone. We are nearing the end. We have been making candles 12 hours a day and on weekends now for over a month. Along the way we have been slowed by COVID and the loss of two employees for just over 2 weeks. Despite all the hurdles, it has been our goal to finish production of all the candles by the end of October. While we will miss that goal by one day, I am happy to say it will be reached tomorrow.  We have had to take all of our shipping staff and move them to candle making to accomplish it but we are now nearing the finish line.

Hello All,
Just a quick update. We hope to have all orders shipped by the end of the month. We have 4,000 candles in 20 different scents ordered from 1,300 people and have been shipping as we get the scents made. It depends on the order of the backing and the scents chosen as we make the candles from light to dark in the color range. 
We were slowed a bit when two of our staff had to stay home for two weeks due to Covid exposure but are working through them as fast as we can. Thank you for your patience.
Warmest regards,
Todd and Tammi

Hello All,

As we mentioned before, we are shipping candles daily in the order they came in. We have thousands of orders to process and we are always working out bugs as we learn more about what our fullfillment process does and doesn't do automatically.

Hello all,
We have tried to be as transparent as possible from the very start so that everyone could feel confident in supporting us. We wanted to address a few comments we have been getting in an update as we cannot keep up answering everyone individually and make your candles at the same time.
From the start, our Kickstarter was designed to help us improve our existing candle not only in how they were made but the space and equipment we used to make them. We did in fact use the funds to manufacture new machines to change the very way these candles are made. Yes, we do sell our existing Spiral Lights that are made the old, slow and inefficient way. The candles shipping now through our Kickstarter campaign are all made in the new and improved and far more efficient way. Despite the Covid Pandemic slowing down delivery of our equipment and supplies, we were able to start producing and shipping the new candles to our backers this month as scheduled.

Hello All,
First off I apologize that it has been awhile since the last update. It has been a crazy time as we try and hire new employees and get new equipment in place during all the Covid unpredictability. The good news is we are now making and sending out the Kickstarter candles. They will be shipping over the next month as we get everyone fulfilled in the order they were received.

Hello all. Its been a but since our last update as we have been moving everything into our new facility and putting the final touches on the custom manufacturing equipment your generous support has allowed us to produce. We expect to atart shipping candles in the next few weeks.
We will uodate again as the boxes start going out.
Warmest regards,

campaign.story:
Simplicity and Objectivity.
 Auto sticking when it goes nearby.
You don't have to wait for it to be opened.
 No motor noise, the noise that scratch my nerves...
 Goes well with the car.
There is only one goal to achieve through 1PICK project. It is to help creating a safe and comfortable driving environment.
It is very dangerous to pay attention to mounting the mobile phone to the holder under the inevitable situation while driving.
Now, you don't need to look at it,  don't need to wait.
Just move it nearby! Enjoy your safe driving now!
So far, there's been a deadly problem for the magnetic holders.
We had to put a big, ugly iron plate on the phone. Many people want to use the magnetic holders, but they have given up on using the magnetic holders because they don't want to attach the ugly things to their smartphones.
 Which one would you attach?
 We thought carefully that... if the ugly iron plate is the problem, then why don't we use the pretty one?
Now 1Pick plate!
 The most important virtue of the smartphone accessory is "must be pretty and cool".
For people, smartphones have become an inseparable part of their daily lives and a fashion item that expresses them.
What does a car mean to you?
It may be your dream, a medium to express you and a precious being that brings convenience. We don't think anyone would want to ruin the interior of such a precious vehicle.
We think that good design is the concise one which can harmonize the complex things.
Magnetic holders are the best fit for that design. Because you don't need hands and feet to hold your smartphone!
1PICK changes the driving environment like this:
When we are boarding a car or getting off, when a call comes in or we are making a call, when we are bored waiting for a signal, we repeatedly hold and unhold the smartphones in the car.
Compare now. How is it different from your appearance?
 Magnetic Holder Testing
PLAY

PLAY

PLAY

PLAY

PLAY

The core of wireless charging is the wireless charging module. Module performance is all about charging performance, safety and failure. Most of the problems such as fire, charging error and slow charging during wireless charging are actually due to unstable modules.
 Module can be charged even at a distance of 7mm

1PICK supports up to 10W of wireless charging.
It requires 15W wireless charging functionality for both transmitter and receiver to be fully compatible for normal 15W wireless charging. The fact that the wireless charger supports 15W does not mean that all smartphones will be 15W wireless charging and even smartphones that support 15W wireless charging may vary depending on the 'standard' used. Even though the smartphone manufacture's 'original specification' has 15W fast wireless charging technology, most third-party wireless chargers do not charge 15W.
In short, most wireless charger specs you know and buy are 15W, but there is no difference in actual charging speed.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
5 years ago, in spring 2016, there was a product that I created with the idea of adding wireless charger to the magnet holder, the most convenient form. I thought, 'Let's use it until the right ready-made product came out'. So I decided to commercialize it myself and now I am trying to do more testing, research, hard work to make the right product because it is a product that many people should use.
We made our first appearance 1PICK through Kickstarter.
Most of the funding amount will be used for the development and mass production of 1PICK, Other funds will be used for the development of subsequent 1PICK products.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Your bathroom is a dirty place.
Your toilet is a breeding ground for bacteria, and every time you flush, toilet particles are projected EVERYWHERE.
Studies have found that with each flush, potentially infectious microbes are launched onto countertops, walls, sinks and more. 
A study at the University of Manchester found toothbrushes to be home to horrific diseases like staphylococcus and E. coli.
Microbes can even travel through plumbing and pipes. According to these reports, viruses have been known to spread through fecal matter.
Ultraviolet (UV) light is lethal to germs acting like silver bullets to these tiny monsters.
Why? UV light scrambles the DNA deep within microbes like bacteria, killing them almost instantly. It’s quick. It’s easy. It’s clean. And, best of all, this superpower now comes built into your toothbrush.
After each use, Lumio kills 99.9% of germs using UV light technology. 
A single touch of a button and your brush head will be sparkling clean, thanks to the miracle of science.
The best part? You don’t even have to think about it. We designed Lumio for people as lazy as we are. Lumio self-cleans automatically once retracted. Speaking of which…
Lumio is the ultimate travel toothbrush because of its snazzy retractable head. Now it’s easy to keep your brush head clean and protected! Lumio is an electric toothbrush made for those on the move.
No more ziplock bags. No more bulky toothbrush cases. 
Travelling is now light and simple.
No need to fret over toiletry bags or cases. Just toss it in your bag before you head out and you’re good to go.
Built for modern travellers, with speed and convenience in mind. Stay clean on the go. 
We'll just say it: we love Apple's product design. That's why we created Lumio with a fully anodized aluminum shell - just like the iPhone and Macbook Pro.
With its clean, minimalist aesthetics, Lumio will feel right at home alongside the necessities of your modern lifestyle.
Lumio's high-quality aluminum build means it's bash-proof and dent-resistant, but also as light as other leading electronic toothbrushes.
Lumio is like a handsome viking bodyguard - rugged yet beautiful and ready to follow you anywhere, on any adventure.
Mermaids rejoice! Lumio is waterproof with its IPX7 water resistance rating.
That means Lumio can be safely submerged under water at a depth of 1 meter for 30 minutes and be completely undamaged. We're not sure why you'd do that, but we thought we'd give you the option anyway.
Lumio's battery lasts up to 2 weeks without needing to be recharged, making it perfect for travellers. It also comes charged right out of the box so you can get started living your new, cleaner life right away.
Additionally, Lumio's charger is small and discrete, so it will take up less space on your countertop compared to other toothbrush chargers.
Lumio cleans using ultra-sonic cleaning technology, meaning you’ll get that icy white smile every time you use it. Each bristle vibrates at an ultrasonic frequency, destroying plaque like a hot knife through butter. 
Lumio is a modern, first-class electric toothbrush with 3 cleaning modes that automatically turn off after 2 minutes:
 Clean Mode | A soft and steady vibration for daily cleaning (280 Hertz, with 33,600 vibrations/min)
 Whitening Mode | The vibration will alternate between fast and slow speed, polishing those pearly whites (250-300 Hertz, with 33,000 vibrations/min)
 Deep Clean Mode | A fast vibration to use when there’s something stuck in your teeth (300 Hertz, with 36,000 vibrations/min)
Lumio brush heads are made with industry leading DuPont nylon bristles. We have placed each bristle in a way that optimizes both ultrasonic cleaning and the UV self-clean function - meaning both your smile and your brush will be clean & germ free! 
Whereas other toothbrush companies charge upwards of $20 for a pack of 3 and provide only 1 brush head with the toothbrush - we include 3 brush heads with Lumio.
Not only that, but extra packs of brush heads are available for as low as $2.08 per head.
Want to add more brush heads to your reward? Simply add $7 per 3-pack of brush heads to your total pledge price. Later, we’ll send you an email to confirm bristle type (soft or medium), color and add-ons.
In the future, we’ll have the brush heads available on Amazon, but for a higher price…so stock up now!
BACKING | Want to get your hands on a Lumio Brush? We don't blame you. Simply select the reward tier you would like to pledge on the right-hand side of the page. 
PAYMENT | Enter your payment information. You will not be charged until the end of the campaign. 
SHIPPING | We will contact you at the end of this campaign to confirm your address, color selection and add-ons. Shipping estimates are flat-rate worldwide. Shipping to US, Canada, Australia, UK, Western Europe, Singapore, Japan, and China will be about $10-15. Shipping to Eastern Europe is approximately $15-20. All other countries will be about $20-25. GST, VAT and other international import duties may apply.
Crowd Pop Marketing is a global crowdfunding agency, working with the world's brightest projects.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Rebeo is a product design company with 12 years of experience. We specialize in fancy electric toothbrush designs – you can see some of our novelty toothbrushes in museum gift shops and tourist spots around the world!

We have already made the production moulds and have the equipment to mass-produce Lumio. We've also started making a few! We will be airmailing Lumio brushes directly from the factory to reduce shipping time for backers. All in all, we expect smooth sailing!

We understand that every project comes with its risks and challenges and are committed to being fully transparent. We are aware of the current COVID-19 pandemic and a potential impact may be lower capacity on freight planes due to fewer planes flying from our factory area. However, we've taken current capacity into account and we still think a late May delivery will be possible.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
Lumio is designed with durability and longevity in mind. Made with high-quality aluminum, Lumio is bash-proof, dent-resistant and ready for a long-term relationship with you.

updates.update_content:
Thanks for all of our patient backers! 
LUMIO team finally finished the all campaign products! 
At this present, all of the orders are been shipping successively, then we’ll send the tracking numbers one by one. Those backers who don’t get any shipping information can contact with us via comments or send email.

I sincerely apologize to all the backers who have not received the product yet as well as the backers who received defective Lumios. As the head of the Lumio team, I apologize for any disappointment you’ve experienced during the Lumio project, although many backers have already received their Lumio toothbrushes and are enjoying them, I still want to explain any ongoing issues to all backers.

First of all, as the head of the Lumio team, I once again sincerely apologize to you on behalf of the entire staff of our team! 
For those who have supported us so far, thank you – your support is very much appreciated as we work through the problems. Okay, let’s get right to it!

updates.update_userinfo: No more words, facing real problems
Shipping update - packages going out at the depot!
updates.update_content:
Hey everyone!
As promised, we dropped the majority of the packages off at the shipping depot today - within the next few days the depot will be sorting it and sending it and you'll be receiving tracking numbers via email. Here are some photos from today and the past couple days!

updates.update_userinfo: Dropping most of the packages off on June 30! Tracking numbers going out soon!
updates.update_content:
Sorry for the delay on the update, everyone! We've been busy!
We've packed and manufactured the majority the the Lumio toothbrush kits and have a scheduled day to drop the packages off at the depot - June 30! 
However, please note that we're still a little behind in manufacturing - about 60% of the pledges are completed and about 40% are still being manufactured, which will be going out soon after. We expect to drop the remaining 40% off at the depot on July 7.

updates.update_userinfo: PledgeBox locked and manufacturing has started!
updates.update_content: Hi everyone! Thanks for your wonderful support so far. We'd just like everyone to know that the PledgeBox surveys have now been sent to the factory and production is in full swing. Here are some photos of the electronics assembly line putting together chips and bodies for Lumio UV toothbrushes! This assembly line starts with the microchips for the electronics components and ends with fitting them into the outer shells. It's so cool to see our designed become physical on this scale.

updates.update_userinfo: PledgeBox extension - let's try and get those surveys complete!
updates.update_content:
Hi everyone!
We're working through everyone's emails and messages, because a lot of you still have questions you need answering before finalizing your pledge, we are going to extend the PledgeBox deadline to noon on Saturday. Hopefully that gives everyone enough time to complete the surveys :) About 85% of you have completed the PledgeBox surveys but we want to get it up to 95% before locking the surveys.

updates.update_userinfo: Only 2 days left on the PledgeBox! Please finalize your pledge!
updates.update_content:
Hello everyone!
Just a gentle reminder that there's only 2 days left on the PledgeBox survey! 
If you haven't completed the survey by the deadline at 11:59pm on May 19, we can't guarantee you'll receive your reward in the first mail-out, and will have to wait for the next manufacturing wave.

updates.update_userinfo: Only 5 days left to confirm your pledge!
updates.update_content:
Hey all!
We're just letting everyone know there's only 5 days left until we lock all orders and ship out. If you haven't yet filled out your PledgeBox survey with your pledge details and shipping information, please check your email ASAP for an email from PledgeBox. 
About 75% of you have completed the PledgeBox survey so we're almost there! We don't want anyone to get left behind when we ship this first wave, so please complete it as soon as possible!

updates.update_userinfo: Pledgebox now LIVE! Please finalize your pledge info!
updates.update_content:
Hi all! We're happy to announce that the PledgeBox is finally up! Now you can complete your shipping information, choose your colors, your brush head type etc. Please check your email (including your Promotions or Spam folder!).
FAQ for the PledgeBox:
What if I don't see the email yet?
Check your spam folder. If you use Gmail, sometimes your invite will go to your "Promotions" tab. If you still can't find it, search your inbox for "PledgeBox"
If that doesn't work:
1. Click - https://survey.pledgebox.com/retrieve/100216/lumio-the-incredible-uv-self-cleaning-toothbrush
2. Click "Request New Invite"
3. Enter your email address (the one you pledged with)
4. Wait at least 10 minutes - then go to your email, open the invite, and click the giant button to confirm all your goodies

That's not impossible. If you notice something is awry, you can send us a message directly to hello@lumiobrush.com and we'll look at it for you.

As long as your items have not been shipped, you can always change your address. Just simply log back in to https://survey.pledgebox.com/user/login and make the appropriate change. However, if you change your country, additional shipping costs may apply.

campaign.story:
Miss out on backing MOFT Z? Follow along with all our production news and updates at www.moft.us    
People invented various sit-stand desks since many years ago. But these desks didn’t change much more so far. They usually come with a bulky size and limited by the workspace environment. And some with cumbersome setup may let you go crazy.
To make people get a flexible posture wherever they are, we realized we’d have to come up with the most convenient sit-stand desk ever.
MOFT Z is a truly lightweight and versatile sit-stand desk at an affordable price. It’s designed to offer THE HEAVEY LAPTOP USER a maximum comfort with maximum freedom on location.

A Magazine-sized Desk with 4 Positions
With the origami-inspired Z structure, MOFT Z provides one mode for standing and three-mode for sitting.  It helps you develop a healthy sit-stand working posture in the easiest way, keeping you active and productive all day.
Working From Home with Right Postures
The ultra-versatile yet like a paper-thin desk body makes it friendly to any working environment, not only to be used in the office but also at home or co-workspace.  
We designed MOFT Z with a continuous one-piece structure. No tool is needed for setup. Stand it up easily when you need it, and unfold it back quickly when you don’t.
All foldings finished in one structure
Most people usually only want to take a short standing, not a giant stand on the desk all day long. As the same size as a magazine, you can store MOFT Z in any corner you like. Keep it "invisible" on your desk. So you won’t notice it when you don’t need it.
It follows the consistent design philosophy of MOFT: unseen, unfelt, unnoticed. 
Can you find it? Guess where am I
Smooth & swift transition between postures
MOFT Z is a fast-blade to open and close. It quickly switches your sit and stand posture and takes the stress off your back in seconds, letting you get a joyful and relaxing posture.
Sitting all day in the office can be stressful to both your body and mind. A quick switch to standing not only helps you stretch a bit for a relaxing back, but also refreshes your mind with a different angle to see your works.
Standing Mode
When you are standing, MOFT Z offers a natural height for your palms to rest onto the laptop, and your eyes to look at the screen with no strain or tension.
Sitting Mode
Surely, you would want to sit back after a short break. Does MOFT Z stopped working by then? Absolutely not. We also prepared three modes to fit your own working style while sitting.
Dedicated flap limiter to stop your laptop from sliding.




The light-weight body foldable design makes MOFT Z the ONLY sit-stand desk that you can use on your laps.
Using MOFT Z on the laps
We didn't trade thinness for durability. Apart from the rock-steady Z structure and tri-angle bottom support, We used the fibre-glass to ensure the toughness of panels and a maximum of 22-lbs weight.
Steady typing in the air
The magnetic flap to reinforce the frame, and the PU material to shield all the scratches and heat, while keeping everything soft and premium to touch.
As thin and light as it is, you can always take MOFT Z away like grabbing a magazine and work anywhere you feel like, in anyway you feel right.
You would never see a desk at the size of an iPad Pro. MOFT Z stays perfectly in your backpack. You can have a flexible working setup anywhere you go like never before.
To complete a product is not simply fixing the structure, we want you to feel good even if you aren't actually using it. The vast coverage of PU material makes everywhere you touch feels soft and smooth to your hands.
The color on the back not only adds an energetic vibe to your desktop, but also works as an indicator of how you act & use the product.
A reliable structure also needs to fight the test of time, all corners and folding lines were reinforced to make sure you can always keep using it without wearing or tearing.
MOFT always aim to make products that all people can buy without having to worry about the steep price. A good design should be everyone’s design. 



PLAY

$500K Stretch Goal Unlocked!
We would like to share some cool things: MOFT Z has been honored with the Red Dot Award Product Design 2020! And the 500K Stretch Goal was unbelievably reached, which means that the MOFT Z Leather Black is officially unlocked!

We found three biggest problems that other products have had: They were too big & heavy for such short time standing; They usually took even longer to store than the already tedious installment; They would still be there even if you don’t want to use them again.  
And we got three answers as well: Small & thin enough to help you forget it’s there； Fast & easy to use just to save time; Disappear when you are done using it.
But a desk is much smaller & cramped than a room, which means we must shrink the size of a chair all the way back while keeping the same rigidity & stability.
We then chose fibre-glass as the basic structure for its toughness and flexibility—it restores most deformation under 60° foldings, much stronger than usual paper structure. It’s a more expensive material, but it’s more durable for the price. 
To enhance the basic structure support, we also used 11 built-in magnets between joints to make it even stronger, and snappier when you fold it back and forth.

People would still sit down after a standing break, that’s why we must keep the triple angles for sitting position, offering much better usability than a usual standing desk.  
To wrap things up, we need to make it aesthetically minimalistic so that it looks and feels just like a MOFT product.




MOFT=Mobile Office For Travelers.
We are a team dedicated to design & create products to help digital nomads to work better, healthier, more energized and focused.
In 2019 we have launched MOFT Stand and MOFT X Series, receiving hundreds of thousands of support from all around the world, and a whopping $3.2million+ sales throughout the year, making them one of the best-selling stands on the market.
And now we are proud to announce that MOFT Stand has won the iF Design Award!
This time, we bring MOFT Z sit-stand laptop desk to you. We hope that all our research, work and creativity has produced a product that will make your office working better. Your support is greatly appreciated. 
Distributor/Retail Business
MOFT welcomes global distributors/retail to join us. And we will continue to share the awesome products and great marketing service as always. Please contact sales@moft.us if you are interested.
This project is managed by xBorders. Founded by former Kickstarter & Facebook employees, we combine industry leading ad tech with carefully crafted branding. We've helped creators raise over $15,000,000 with campaigns that deliver. 
As one of the first crowdfunding marketing agencies, Enventys Partners has brought more than 750 crowdfunding projects to life through lead generation, campaign page creation, public relations, email marketing, Facebook Advertising, campaign management and more.
This campaign is promoted by LemoreLab. Since 2015, LemoreLab has successfully helped creators crowdfunded over $10,000,000 from 30,000+ backers. 
This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 850+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $500M raised between them
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is our 3rd Kickstarter project. So we have much experience in how damn things will happen in the production and shipping process, which also means we are pretty sure how to set accurate expectations and deliver on our promises in time.

In the last year, we've developed, manufactured, and sold plenty of foldable stands all over the world. We have already signed agreements with key suppliers and manufacturers, and our prototype has been finalized. We've got some experience under our belts.

While there are always risks & challenges with creating and delivering a new product, if we are met with these events, we promise to communicate/update with full transparency to our backers.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
Abrasion-resistant PU will be used for the surface, with deformation-resistant glass fiber for internal parts.
Reusability and recyclability
The material for manufacturing is reusable and recyclable, such as paper and glass fiber, which is RoHS recognized.
Environmentally friendly factories
Our factory is ISO and BSCI certified, both reusable and material will be used during the joint-development of products.
