campaign.story:
7-Time Project Creator!
⚡Charles Harris leads the team with 7 years crowdfunding experience raising nearly $2 million dollars USD with support from over 50,000 crowdfunding backers worldwide! See his other campaigns listed at the bottom of the page.
The world’s first charging and data transfer cable of its kind! Organizing your cables has never been simpler or more addictive. Simple to use and ingenious, SuperCalla will meet all of your OCD needs.  Our "automagic" technology holds the SuperCalla cable in a neat and tidy shape while remaining fully functional and extendable.  Our patent pending design provides easy storing, fast charging, and organized traveling all in the palm of your hands—you will never want to put it down!
⚡Quick and easy to coil and organize!
⚡Short 3ft (0.9m) or long 6ft (1.8m) cables!
⚡From neatly coiled to fully released just like that!
⚡Great for traveling. Quick and easy storage with no tangles!
⚡Combine SuperCalla with any car mount for a winning combination.
⚡SuperCalla is truly one of a kind. It doesn't get any better than that!
⚡Fold and connect, fold and connect again, it's that simple!
⚡This cable is impossible to put down!
⚡We call it the twister. Once you figure it out, it's fairly simple!
We have 6 foot cables offered as a $3 upgrade if you require a long reach!
⚡Up, up and out of the way!
⚡Easily coil your cable for a neat and tidy charge or data transfer session.
⚡Make your coil small or large keeping those counter tops looking great.
⚡Unlike any other cable you have ever set your fingers on!
⚡Here is a dual cable setup we use. So nice and clean. What do your cables look like?
⚡SuperCalla is short and organized but does not require disconnecting to use the device unlike other short cables.
⚡Charging your AirPods has never looked so good!
⚡Even wireless chargers are better with SuperCalla!
⚡Gotta love not having cables clogging the drawers!
Warning! This is not a toy for children!  Keep out of reach.  Suggested for ages 15 and up. 
Coil, snap, uncoil, repeat. During our brainstorming sessions we could not put SuperCalla down. The snapping of the magnets and coiling of the cord was satisfying and extremely addictive. We quickly realized that we were fidgeting with our cables for fun as much as they were charging our devices.  We cannot wait to see all the designs our supporters come up with!  Please keep in mind, this product is not only plugged into an outlet when charging, it contains magnets as well.  Please be cautious and keep out of reach of children.  We suggest the use for ages 15 and up.  
⚡SuperCalla will become your desk toy of choice. Your office buddies will be jealous!
⚡We call it the flattened flower. Okay, now get back to work!
⚡What size coil would you like? The choice is yours!
Supercalla is as functional as it is aesthetically pleasing.  Our cables are up to speed. SuperCalla is rated for fast charging, data transfer, and it is also compatible with wireless fast charging technology. SuperCalla cables are also made to last. They're reinforced with our flexible, protective silicone tubing and made with premium, high-grade materials.  Last but not least, our cables are compatible with nearly every phone or device in your arsenal!  Let's get charging together!
Our specs and technology are up to date with what manufacturers suggest and provide with the majority of their devices in order to provide a fast, safe charging environment.
 Important! Reward upgrades 
All above reward pricing is for standard NON-iPhone connection types in 3ft (0.9m) length. There will be a $2 upgrade for iPhone connection types.  We have recently added a type c to type c charging cable with 100w 5a PD charging capabilities that will incur an additional $3 charge (this specific cable may only be available in 3ft length). There will be a $3 upgrade for 6ft (1.8m) length cables.  These upgrades are per cable. You will be able to upgrade and make these selections after the campaign ends. 
 Important! Shipping Charges
Below is our estimated shipping charges for standard shipping. The shipping charges are based on our expected volume and could increase or decrease slightly. The shipping charges shown are the estimated TOTAL amount you will be charged.  It is NOT a per cable charge. 
Our team researched charging cable standards and what goes into the same cables that come with your devices.  Not so we could duplicate them, but so we could make them better!  We tested hundreds of cables, connection types, magnets and silicone tubes ensuring our cables have superior quality while meeting USB requirements and international safety certifications. 
⚡Functionality is key to our patent pending product. Genius, but it wasn't rocket science!
⚡We have tested hundreds of cables to get to this point. There is no turning back now!
⚡Our sleeves provide protection and is key to the functionality of SuperCalla Cables.
⚡As fancy as connection leads have become, we found the simplest designs to perform the best!
⚡Let's just say the office didn't have enough space!
⚡Seemingly ordinary, these magnets are not your typical breed!
Not only are we a father-son and father-daughter duo—we are all related!  Combining all of our knowledge was a no-brainer.  Together we have a combined total of over 100 years of experience in business operations, engineering, project management, product design and development, process engineering, supply chain management, digital marketing, and entrepreneurship!
⚡My father, my uncle, my cousin and I complete what I call a dreamteam!
⚡Charles Harris leads the team with 7 years crowdfunding experience raising nearly $2 million dollars USD with support from over 50,000 crowdfunding backers worldwide!
⚡I have always loved simple ideas. You can find these projects I launched under Xpand here on Kickstarter!
⚡We used our phones to film and shoot the entire campaign, and we used our SuperCalla cables to keep us charged up and to transfer all of our footage and images!
I want to give a special thank you to the advertising agencies that helped us raise and amazing amount of support from backers.  I would not hesitate to consider using any of the agencies listed below if you are a Kickstarter Creator! 
This campaign is promoted by Backercamp. Since 2012, Backercamp has helped 5,000+ creators make their projects a reality, raising over $275MM through crowdfunding. 
As one of the first crowdfunding marketing agencies, Enventys Partners has brought more than 750 crowdfunding projects to life through lead generation, campaign page creation, public relations, email marketing, Facebook Advertising, campaign management and more.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
With launching a new product into the world, there are risks and challenges. We feel confident that the risk for this project is very low. We are ready to begin our manufacturing process once our funding goal is hit. We have experience from 6 previous successfully delivered campaigns! Our team is 100% ready to bring SuperCalla into the world. Generally the biggest risk on Kickstarter is for unknown delays in manufacturing. Things can always change along the way when bringing a new product into the world for the first time. With a technology product, there are many hurdles to jump over and we are ready to jump. 
This isn't my first rodeo and we are ready to tackle any unforeseen issues that come our way. We plan to bring as close as possible, SuperCalla cables in its demonstrated form on this project. All information we disclose in updates, in the comments and in private or direct messages in this campaign or through emails is subject to change as we move through production. There may be critical decisions we need to make moving forward that we did not foresee or that we cannot control. Our ultimate goal is to deliver one awesome cable to our supporters! For more information on Kickstarter Projects, please see the Kickstarter Support page, and their Terms of Use.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
We are an independent design studio from the United Kingdom specialising in minimalist writing instruments made from exotic materials.
Welcome to our sixth writing instrument project on Kickstarter: Naos. 
The Naos is precision-machined from a choice of 3 materials, aluminium, bronze and Grade 5 Titanium:

Change the grip section to transform your Naos into either a fountain pen or a rollerball, and choose between a more minimalist or classic style with a removable clip. 
Extra grip sections can be purchased separately for £10, and clips are £8.





The Naos Aluminium is made from anodised aircraft-grade aluminium which protects the pen from scratches, and it also features a precision-machined stainless steel grip section and finials.
Three colours are available: Satin Black, Cobalt Blue and Aurora Green 
The Naos Titanium is machined entirely from Grade 5 titanium with a matt beadblasted finish on the barrel and a machined finish on the other parts of the pen. The top finial also features fine knurled details on the outside.
The standard stainless steel nib can also be upgraded to a titanium flex nib for an extra £45.
Bronze pens are very hard to find and usually very expensive, which makes the Naos a great opportunity to add one to your collection. Every single part of the pen except the nib has been machined from CuSn8 bronze, the same grade used in high-end watch cases. This material is very heavy and will form an attractive patina with age. 
We use only the best nibs, manufactured by Peter Bock in Germany. The Naos uses Bock 250 which is a large nib with a 6mm feed, commonly known as a #6 nib.
You can add additional nibs to your pledge. Your pen comes with a steel nib, but you can upgrade to more flexible material like titanium for greater line variation. The nibs use a screw-in assembly so you don't need any tools to change them.
Each material has a different character. Titanium has significant flex (considered a semi-flex nib). Steel is very smooth but provides little flex.
Stainless Steel sizes:  EF, F, M, B.
Titanium: EF, M
Titanium Flex Nib - EF






The Naos fountain pen can be used with international standard cartridges (short or long) or a refillable cartridge called a "converter" which has a piston mechanism inside to draw ink up through the nib.

As explained above, you can transform your Naos fountain pen into a rollerball and vice versa by changing its grip section (extra grip section required, add £10 to your pledge). 
The rollerball refill provided is the Schmidt 5888F in black with a fine tip, a very smooth writer that uses water-based ink which, unlike ballpoints, requires very little pressure to write. This reduces fatigue and cramping during writing sessions.

Keep your pen safe with our custom sleeves which are made by hand from high quality leather that has gone through the natural process of vegetable tanning.
Simply add £10 to your pledge.

You can choose options like colour, fountain pen/rollerball, and nib size in a survey that you will receive at the end of the campaign.
Interested in multiple pens? Pledge for a set and save more!


Want to add extra pens? Apart from the sets we offer, you can add extra pens to your reward simply by adding the following amounts to your pledge:
To have two writing instruments in one, just add £10 to your pledge to get one rollerball grip section with a Schmidt refill.
Add the following amounts to your pledge. The accessories will also be available to add in the survey at the end of the campaign.


Namisu was founded by Adrien Cols and Maria Millan, two fountain pen enthusiasts and designers based in Edinburgh, United Kingdom.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We have completed five large writing instrument projects over the past 5 years on Kickstarter and we will use this experience to successfully deliver your pledge.

Throughout this time, we have developed strong relationships with experienced manufacturers which is crucial to delivering a high quality product. We are using similar manufacturing techniques as our previous five projects and have developed a production prototype to validate the feasibility of the design.

We know that there can always be some unexpected delays during production but we have planned for this and extended our production schedule accordingly. Raw materials like metal rods can arrive late during busy periods of the year; machines can break down and require servicing. These are minor delays that may require a small extension to the delivery date of the project, but which wouldn't affect our ability to deliver the project.

Another common challenge is fulfilling a project that exceeds its project funding goal significantly. To solve this potential issue we are working with large manufacturers that can produce our pens in any quantity realistically possible on Kickstarter. We do not anticipate any extension of the delivery date unless the project exceeds 2000 backers, at which point we would need to revise the manufacturing completion target date.

We are also working with a professional logistics and fulfilment company which will handle all shipping and packing operations to avoid any delays during the shipping phase of the project.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hi Backers,
Good news! The clips have now been shipped to all backers who have ordered them. The clips should arrive within 4 days in the UK, 1 week in the USA, 3 weeks in the EU and 4 weeks in all other regions. Normally shipping would be much quicker but due to the global pandemic there are significant shipping delays that you've no doubt already heard about. We're sorry about the wait!

updates.update_userinfo: Shipping Update. Important info about the clip.
updates.update_content:
Hi Backers,
We’re progressing well with the shipment phase of the project. We will be shipping all Naos pens on time.
All Naos pens for USA customers (almost half of all backers) have already left our premises and are currently with our shipping partner. The pens will be shipped locally from Ohio via USPS.
All other pens will be shipped from our UK warehouse next week.
There has unfortunately been a delay with the production of clips, but we will send out all pens anyway and then ship the clips separately at a later time.

updates.update_userinfo: How to update your Shipping Address
updates.update_content:
Hi Backers,
To help us ship your Naos pen to the right place, please check that your shipping address is correct, especially if you've recently moved. We plan to ship all Naos pens at the end of the month on June 30, so we will "lock" all order addresses on Monday 22.
You can change your address in the PledgeManager survey app. You can either go back to your survey by clicking on the link we sent you in the original invite or in the reminder that we will send today in a separate e-mail.

updates.update_userinfo: Still on target for June shipping.
updates.update_content:
Hi Backers,
A quick update to let you know that we are still on track to deliver all pens by the end of the month.
As things stand, we have completed the machining and finishing of all the pens bodies, and have received the nibs from Bock in Germany. The leather sleeves are also done.

Hi Backers,
Just a quick update to say that production is going well and we are not anticipating any delays despite the current situation. We are still aiming to ship the Naos by June 30.
We hope that you are staying safe and that those of you who are confined at home are at least able to find a little more time to write with your fountain pens.

Hi Backers,
The survey is now available to all backers, please take a few minutes to complete it so that we can know which pen options you would like e.g. nib size, colour, as well as your delivery address. Below are some frequently asked questions about the survey.
How do I access the survey? We've sent a survey invitation to the e-mail you use to login to Kickstarter. Click on the link in this e-mail to access your survey. Check your spam/junk/promotions folder if you cannot see the e-mail in your inbox.

Hi Backers!
Thanks to your amazing support the Naos project is now happening! 
The next step is for us to send out the survey where you can provide your delivery address and let us know which nib size and extra accessories/pens you would like. We’re still working on the survey and we will send out another update when it is ready for you to complete.

updates.update_userinfo: New Kickstarter for HoldenArt Chess Set - Launching Tomorrow!
updates.update_content:
I hope everyone is doing well and enjoying their paper towel holders. That would be a unique thing... to enjoy something like a paper towel holder! But, please do let me know if there are any issues with yours.

I wanted to let you know that I am launching a new Kickstarter tomorrow for my chess set. The best deals are on the first day. And these prices will never again be this low!
If you or anyone you know plays chess, this is THE set to have!
Here's the link to the preview page: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/holdenart/your-new-favorite-chess-set?ref=elfgl8&token=1818d2df

With the exception of two Backers who ordered additional items (and close friends and family), all Rewards have been sent out. If you live in the USA, you should have received your PolarityGear. International Backers should get theirs in the next few days. If I accidentally did not include the tips and assembly instructions, they are here.
I have not received any feedback, hopefully folks are happy with their items. If there is anything unsatisfactory with your PolarityGear, please let me know! If you like yours, please consider spreading the word.

Again I appreciate everyone's patience. We've received all the parts and we're assembling them this week. Your paper towel holder will ship later this week. Thanks for your support!
-William

Happy 4th of July and Thank-you for your support!!
We have sent out surveys and almost everyone has replied. We are focused on fulfilling the Kickstarter orders which consist of the Countertop models (Black and Aqua) and the Magnetic Mounted model. These three items are all in production as we speak.
We wanted to package the items in a pulp paper molded structure, but we have decided against it for this first run; the expense of tooling is too much at the moment for us.

Dear Backers,
We hope all of you are staying healthy and making-do during this unique time. 
It appears that the PolarityGear products will go out in June, hopefully sooner. We were forced to change suppliers for the magnetic base. To get the cost to a similar price point as the original supplier, we decided to make it aluminum. With it being  aluminum, we wanted to beef it up a little. Aluminum is a better fit for the item and the end result looks even better. It will be either powder coated black or anodized black. We’re waiting on samples to see how they look. When the survey goes out (in a few weeks) to get everyone’s address information, folks who ordered the magnetic mounted item will have a chance to cancel or change their order since we presented it as stainless steel during the campaign. Photos will show the new aluminum magnetic mounted paper towel holder so you’ll be able to see what it looks like.

Dear Backers,
I hope this update finds you healthy. Likely, the PolarityGear product is not high on your list of concerns these days. But I felt it was time to send an update nonetheless.
There are too many unknowns to accurately predict when exactly we'll be able to ship the products out. I was hoping to get them out in April, but that is not likely. I feel like May (the original delivery date) is still promising without any major hiccups.

Again, a Huge Thank-You to all Backers! We're excited to get PolarityGear out to folks to experience first-hand. We're confident that once people use it, it will get traction and do very well. Manufacturing is on-schedule and we plan to fulfill Kickstarter orders in late April. These will be our first products out of the gate. We'll reach-out with a survey in a few weeks to get your address to send-out the products. We will never share your personal info.
In early May we will have a booth at the National Hardware Show in Las Vegas. We're planning to have a full lineup of products from production.

campaign.story:
Turning an idea into reality is never easy. During our journey, Zeropoint has gathered over 7,000 backers supporting our innovations. Without all your constructive support and comments, we wouldn't have the perseverance to strive for excellence. Therefore we would like to thank you by creating better products, not only bring you joy, but also make our lives better.
After the boom of I'm the smallest bag, I'm the smallest pack and I'm the anytime tote we are pleased to announce our forth milestone: I'm the foldyroll bag
I'm the foldyroll bag continues the simplicity and functionality of previous design, with enhanced shape and colors.
The auto-folding feature presents tidiness and cleanliness, overturning the traditional design of eco-bags.
   After constant review, persistent research, and serious testing, the foldyroll bag is a significant enhancement. The new design is remarkably precise in form, flexible in shape and classy in color.
The foldyroll bag has insisted on its splash-proof function, to keep dry and clean.
Single roll out to open
Rapid speed to re-organize
Auto fold in design
Simple reverse to original size
Avoiding crumple, fragility and messiness in usual bags, the foldyroll bag presents tidiness and toughness.
It is flexible in form, compatible with small items to large objects.
Made by tough material with triple stitching that holds up to 20KG.
  To cater your different needs, I'm the foldyroll bag is available in 2 sizes. The flexible design fits for small items to large items (e.g. 16" MacBook Pro).
The foldyroll bag has a significant breakthrough in providing 8 wonderful colors. Each of them is the specially picked, representing different characters. Varied from dull to bright, it is best to bring along to express your daily mood!
All backers can get limited edition, please see our update #9
The foldyroll bag is flexible and expandable to fit for variety of items. With its updated design and stronger material, we are confident that the foldyroll bag will be your best storage solution every day.
 There is no doubt that pollution is putting our earth at risk. Among all the pollutions, is was reported that plastic polluters have won in 2019, including plastic shopping bags, packages, bottles and clothes. By 2030, plastic production is expected to grow 40% by 2030. Even we can’t do huge rescue to change the environment, we can take small steps by changing our behavior. Therefore, we hope this project will not only be an innovation, but also a contribution to environmental protection.
Project timeline
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
By the experience of 3 campaigns, the most significant challenge is to breakthrough the mindset from previous ideas and not be limited to it. For this time, we have done so many researches on product and campaign design, hoping to give our dear backers some fresh features. Other than new designs, we have remained the signature features of bags collection, keeping it small, strong and stylish. We believe our experience accumulated in previous projects will make us be more mature, which brings backers a smoother operation and service.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Dear Backers, 
The day is finally here! Shipping of your rewards started last week on August. Our shipping partners are processing orders as we speak and you will soon start getting emails with order tracking information.
Please Note: Some backers might receive tracking email earlier or later than others. This is because the orders are shipped out in batches and it will take some time to process all orders.

Dear Backers
First of all, a BIG thank you for all your support and patience! We are excited and happy to announce that we will start shipping out the bags first week of August as promised in our last update!
Please note: We will close surveys this Monday EOD. So please complete the surveys.

updates.update_userinfo: Starting Shipping | Surveys close in 2 days!
updates.update_content:
Hello Backers!
Great news! Production of Escpade bags is complete!
The Escpade bags are ready to be shipped out! The quality check of the bags will start next week and then they will be packed and ready for our courier partners for pickup.

updates.update_userinfo: Rewards Survey - Last Call + Shipping Update
updates.update_content:
Dear Backers
Hope everyone is safe! These are difficult times for all of us. When we started this project, like everyone else, we had no idea how the world will change in few weeks! With your support, we were able to vastly surpass our goal and YOU brought our dream to reality. 
We are posting after some delay, as we were trying our best to meet the June deadline for delivery and only inform you after confirming everything. We have had some delay on 2 fronts: the raw material supplier had supply chain problems so he delivered the material little later than expected. Secondly, the shipping world is upside down right now. The shipping rates are higher than we estimated before Covid when we launched the project. Some routes are not even open yet.

Dear Backers,
Hope you all are doing great and keeping yourself safe!
So, what’s been happening?
Surveys are hugely important for us and we wanted to be completely sure with what we promise. It took us a while to send out the surveys because we wanted to be sure the manufacturing and shipping was in place and on time before promising you anything. We are delighted to say that manufacturing is going on as scheduled. We are still working with our shipping partners to make sure rewards will start going out in June as promised.

updates.update_userinfo: Surveys are out! Plus an exciting Add-on!
updates.update_content:
Dear Backers,
WE MADE IT!! Thank you!! 🤗😘
We can't thank you enough! This 5 weeks of journey with you, dear backers, has been amazing! With nearly 5500 backers and over $300,000 in funding, you have blown us away! We owe all the success to your support and trust. We can't wait to ship out the bags so you can start enjoying this functional and high quality product!
Next Steps

updates.update_userinfo: You are wonderful! Thanks for making Escpade a reality! 🙌
updates.update_content:
You guys are incredible! Because of your love and support, we have reached 4350+ backers!
We highly value your faith in us and are working hard to make sure Escpades get delivered before promised June 2020. 
Share us on Facebook!

updates.update_userinfo: 4350+ backers! Thank you for the enormous support!
updates.update_content:
Thank you! Thank you! Thank you!
Funded in 8 hours and now we have crossed $50,000 being 1250% funded! We are so humbled and excited by such a tremendous response and the love shown by you guys. This wouldn't have been possible at all without your support. 
We are closely listening to any feedback you give us and strive to jointly create a truly great toiletry bag! Again a big thank you from the whole Escpade team!

campaign.story:
“I can’t believe we’ve put a man on the moon, yet we use a poo stick to clean the toilet.”
FlushBrush is a replacement for your horrible toilet brush. It’s a new take on toilet cleaning. Every other object in your bathroom has modernised, become more convenient and more hygienic, except the toilet brush! 
The design of the toilet brush has remained the same since the invention of the modern toilet, and most of us keep them within 1 meter of our toothbrushes.
This really has to change. The FlushBrush brings toilet cleaning into the 21st century.

You asked and I listened! Now we've hit £50k in funding the DARK GREY FlushBrush will be available to choose during the address survey at the end of the campaign! 
For backers ordering multiple units, you'll be able to decide on the colour for each of them between white and dark grey. 
The FlushBrush is more hygienic in three key ways. 
The silicone head repels water and waste, unlike bristled brushes. 
The head is stored inside the toilet, with water passing over it with every flush; nothing that touches the inside of the toilet ever leaves the toilet. 
The head can be replaced whenever you want to, making it easier to maintain your standard of cleanliness in the bathroom. 
To use the FlushBrush, just pick up the handle from the base, push to connect the head in the cradle and lift it out to start cleaning. When you’re done, position the head back into the cradle, and pull back on the handle trigger to release the head. The cradle has a magnet in it to keep the head secure. Replace the handle in the base and job done!
To install the FlushBrush in your bathroom, lift the toilet lid and position the cradle tightly under the rim of the toilet to ensure maximum water coverage. Once the forks of the cradle are tightly under the rim, fold back the flexible aluminium strip around your toilet bowl, moulding the FlushBrush cradle into place to perfectly fit your toilet. 
The FlushBrush cleaning head is stored discreetly underneath the flow of water, cleaning the head with each flush. As you routinely use your toilet, the water passing over it will dislodge anything that wasn’t repelled by the silicone cleaning surface, and the regular flows of water will prevent bacteria buildup by flushing the whole system each time you use the toilet.
FlushBrush's silicone cleaning head repels water and dirt, and has been specifically designed to avoid having any dirt traps. Silicone is an extremely hydrophobic material, meaning water and dirty substances can hardly stick to it – it’s often used in high quality cooking and medical tools to ensure the highest standards of hygiene. 
This makes silicone the perfect material for FlushBrush's cleaning head.
FlushBrush’s handle only ever makes indirect contact with the inside of the toilet bowl. Anything that makes direct contact with waste stays inside the bowl, and is rinsed with fresh water every time you flush. No transferring of dripping toilet juices from bowl to holder like with a traditional toilet brush.
We’ve heard stories of children and dogs running around the house waving toilet brushes, spreading germs and bleach all over the home. With FlushBrush, you can store the handle out of reach, and even if someone does get hold of it, you can be sure it’s never made direct contact with the inside of the bowl. In addition, there’s no need to routinely sterilise the handle in bleach, so there’s no risk that anyone will spill a pot of chemicals (and poo!) over the floor of your bathroom...
FlushBrush saves water. The silicone head is cleaned routinely during normal use of your toilet, so there’s no need to flush especially to clean (as you might with a bristled brush). With each toilet flush using an average of 1.6gallons/6 litres of water, saving on those unnecessary flushes will really add up.
FlushBrush saves on chemical usage. Traditional bristled brushed need to be regularly disinfected with bleach, which is flushed down drains and into the environment. FlushBrush uses the water already flowing over it to stay clean, reducing the need for disinfecting chemicals.
FlushBrush wastes less plastic. When you want to change your bristled toilet brush, you need to throw away the whole thing - at least 100g of plastic straight into the bin. With FlushBrush, only the cleaning head needs occasional replacing, and it weighs just 2g of plastic. This means you can still maintain your standards of hygiene without all the unnecessary waste. 
With FlushBrush, the only part stored outside of the toilet is the handle itself. Each reward tier comes with a free floor base stand, and we will make a wall bracket an option for all backers to add to their order once the campaign ends if we reach £100k!
I first had the idea for FlushBrush in 2017 after “inheriting” a second hand toilet brush when I moved into a new apartment. I then began discussing with my roommate why we used such a disgusting and old fashioned tool for cleaning the toilet...
A lot of thinking, testing and hard work later, we had the first prototype. I took it to a bathroom trade show Birmingham (UK) in March 2018, and spent 3 days talking to bathroom experts. At the show, I realised there were major improvements I could make to the design, and so it was back to work. 
Footage: BBC Dragons Den. Series 17 - Episode 1 (2019)
At that show, someone suggested that I should apply for Dragons’ Den. I did, and thought nothing more of it. Development continued through our second and third prototypes, each an improvement on the last, but progress was slow as all the design work was funded just by me. Then, by February of 2019, I found myself auditioning for Dragons’ Den with my fifth prototype. I never thought it would happen, but I was selected to film with just four weeks’ notice. 
Together, with my amazing design team, we pushed through a few more versions, making final tweaks to ensure everything was ready for me to appear on TV. Dragons’ Den was a success, and I secured two offers from Sara Davies and Touker Souleyman. As many of you may know, not all projects that are funded on TV make it all the way, and ultimately launching a Kickstarter to get the FlushBrush directly into the homes of those that want it most was the best route to take. Since filming the show last year, I have made further design improvements, and am now ready to make FlushBrush a reality with your help. 
After almost 3 years since I first started working on the idea, I couldn't be more excited to begin the next stage with all of you aboard! 
Click to download the FlushBrush Press Kit
https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-7345037/Entrepreneur-TVs-Dragons-Den-unveil-UKs-self-cleaning-loo-device.html
https://www.dailyecho.co.uk/news/17889434.dragons-39-den-inventor-tom-keen-toilet-39-flush-brush-39/
https://www.thetimes.co.uk/article/dragons-den-review-new-dragon-sara-davies-was-feeling-flush-wr2jbpbvh
https://www.realitytitbit.com/bbc/dragons-den/how-to-buy-the-toilet-flush-brush-from-dragons-den-episode-1 
 ^ An early FlushBrush demo video to round off the campaign. If you have any further questions, please let us know!
This project is promoted by J ellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 1,000+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $450MM raised between them.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
As mentioned in the Development section, FlushBrush has been a long time in the making. We have been through many different iterations of the design and only have a small amount of tweaks to make ahead of tooling and mass production. In the weeks that follow the campaign, these small changes will take place and you'll be kept up to date on the progress every step of the way. 

As you'd expect, we have our factory partners already lined up and ready to be given the green light, and from there production can get underway. There is always a risk that these partners fall through, so we have backups of everything in place and more than enough time in the delivery window to address any issues. As a backer of this campaign, you'll be notified during each manufacturing milestone of the FlushBrush!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
While the cleaning head may need to be replaced periodically to maintain hygiene standards, all other parts of the FlushBrush are designed to last. The handle and base unit never come into direct contact with any waste inside the bowl, and the cradle is washed alongside the head with each flush, ensuring it won't need replacing.
Reusability and recyclability
Each FlushBrush head contains only 2g of plastic, a whopping 98% less than that used in the traditional toilet brush. When it comes time to change brush, a fraction of the plastic waste will be generated. For our packaging, we're sending every unit with simple kraft paper boxes that will keep the FlushBrush safe, but be fully recyclable in a further attempt to reduce unnecessary wastage.

updates.update_content:
Dear Supporters,

Shipping is almost complete!

Because we have 13,000 orders, almost 800 permutations and over 150,000 items to pack, we wanted to make sure we are doing everything as efficiently as possible, to ensure speed through customs and as low of an error rate as possible.

Dear Supporters
A little over a month since our last update, a huge amount of work is going on behind the scenes, with plenty of positive news to report:

Production update

The last month has been amazing!
I cannot thank the Kickstarter community enough for the incredible support for my project over the last 30 days. To everyone who has backed the project, I am so grateful and cannot wait to get the FlushBrush manufactured and into all of your homes. 
What happens next?

campaign.story: As one of the first crowdfunding marketing agencies, Enventys Partners has brought more than 750 crowdfunding projects to life through lead generation, campaign page creation, public relations, email marketing, Facebook Advertising, campaign management and more.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
If the Dash BANDO 2.0 gets funded, we will make sure everything goes according to plan to meet the promised deadlines. Projects often have trouble completing production and meeting the expected deadlines for shipment. The project could face possible challenges if the quality of the product or packaging does not meet our requirements. However, we will personally be in charge of assembling and shipping all of the pledge rewards as soon as we reach our goal. Our last project was fortunate enough to deliver earlier than expected.
If the volume overwhelms us, we will get assistance from a professional post-production company. Our team is experienced and has been preparing for months to ensure that post-funding will be like clockwork when the time comes.
Although we do not see any direct risks and challenges, there are always indirect or unseen tasks that may present itself during the process of productions. We hope to run everything as streamlined as possible and also ahead of schedule.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
We're YSMART. We design and make cool EDC products. After the success of YSMART 1.0 with 2500+ backers and over 8000 products fulfilled, we received a heap of great feedback.  Now we are glad to be back with our Kickstarter #3.
Meet YSMART 2.0: The Magnetic Quick-Release Flashlight for Everyday Carry. 
The “Pop-to-Light” solution provides an extremely convenient, easy, fast way to use when you need light in a big hurry. The upgraded version is smallest, lightest,  brightest, more durable, and more convenient than ever before.
Sometimes you just need a strong light, fast. With YSMART 2.0 you get a handy, EDC flashlight that you can take it with you anywhere, and light up anything in an instant.
No more searching blindly around in the dark or fumbling around to unlock your flashlight. We’ve done away with the need to twist your flashlight to turn it on/off. YSMART 2.0 provides a magnetic quick-release solution. Simply pull it off your keychain then the flashlight turns on immediately.  
Never worry about accidentally disconnecting your YSMART2.0. Featuring a powerful magnet with 2.5kg/4.8lb of pulling force, you can place it anywhere without worrying about it falling off. 
Extending the light’s functionality, the magnet can be attached to metal surfaces for hands-free. 

With YSMART2.0, we’ve created our most powerful micro flashlight yet. You get 100 lumens packed into a tiny, robust design.
We wanted to do better than the already-stunning original YSMART 1.0, so we upgraded our equipment to feature a state-of-the-art SUPER THIN SMD LED module, which offers maximum output for minimum energy consumption.
YSMART 2.0 is small enough to carry wherever you go. WOW! Your sports bag, your jacket, and even attach to your keychain. Perfect match for any indoor or outdoor activities. It’s in-interesting that your buddy finds out you’re carrying such a mini but functional cool stuff.


This amazing design is made of signature black aerospace aluminum or solid ultra -tough titanium. YSMART 2.0 not only looks great, but is practically unbreakable.  
The main piece of feedback we received from YSMART 1.0 was that the flashlight itself has a magnetic base, but you need to twist it to turn it on and off—so while practical and useful, at times it wasn’t as convenient as it could be.  
So, we went back to the drawing board to determine how we could provide a solution to this feedback. How could we improve on YSMART 1.0 ? Make it easy to detach, with automatic on/off! And so, the YSMART 2.0 quick-release auto-lighting mechanism was born. We spent a year on research and development, refining our designs until we landed on the design you see today.
SPECIFICATIONS
Weight: Titanium- 12g / Aluminum- 8g
 Width: 1cm Length: 3cm 
Materials: Premium Aerospace Grade Aluminum Alloy / Grade 5 Titanium 
Battery: LR41/AG3 Button Cell （NOT INCLUDE）
Type of Bulb: Micro SMD LED 2.0

This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 1000+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $430M raised between them.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
There are always challenges and unforeseen obstacles that arise when trying to bring a product to life. Fortunately, we learned a lot from our previous campaigns which fulfilled 15,000+ units to 4,000+ backers successfully.

During the production process, we expect to make minor changes to optimize the design for mass production.

We will be using a professional fulfillment company to handle the logistics of shipping, in order to ensure that the side of the operation is well covered.

If any issues arise, we'll contact you as timely and openly as possible.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Reusable Organic Cotton Tissues in a Hygienic Design
We would like to introduce you to LastTissue. It’s like if a handkerchief and a tissue pack had a baby 👶. 
We're bringing you the best of both worlds: the easy, on-the-go 🚶‍♀️ availability of the tissue pack and the environmentally-friendly🌱, soft-on-the-nose handkerchief. We want to bring the handkerchief back into mainstream culture.
How it Works
Simply take a tissue from the bottom, use it, and then store it on top of the marked-tissue barrier. This way, you’ll push the clean tissues down, making them ready to use and dividing them from the used. You’ll know you’re on your last tissue when the marked one appears - that means it’s cleaning time. After washing, you repack and use them all over again.
Tissues cause more damage than you might think
The paper and pulp industry is the third-largest industrial emitter of global warming gasses💨. Every year around 8,000,000 trees 🌳 are cut down to make facial tissues for the US alone. 
Deforestation can lead to a direct loss of wildlife habitat 🐵.  The removal of trees reduces available food, shelter, and breeding habitat. It also removes the miraculous effect the trees have of cleaning our carbon emissions to breathable oxygen - helping to prevent climate change 🌎.  
💧Every time you blow your nose with a LastTissue, you save 2 liters of water.
⚡It takes 3 times more energy to produce paper tissues compared to the reusable cotton tissues.
😲 With one LastTissue pack, you will save the planet from more than 2800 single-use tissues as well as their plastic packaging.
Making reusable the standard
Imagine a world with more trees🌳, less production⚙️, less shipping✈️ , and less CO2 emissions. Imagine a world with objects that last. Together let us reduce - and even eliminate - the need for single-use products.
Every day 22,000 trees🌳 are cut down just to supply facial tissues for The US. Imagine how many trees are cut down worldwide. This is simply unnecessary. Reusability can make a huge difference.     
representing endangered animals
137 species of animals are going extinct every day because of deforestation.  Our five colors represent five species that are endangered due to deforestation.  
🦝 Raccoon Blue. The pygmy raccoon, is a critically endangered species off the coast of Yucatan Peninsula, Mexico.
🐉 Dragonfly Turquoise. 163 Mediterranean dragonflies and damselflies show that five species are critically endangered.
🦊 Fox Peach. Darwin’s fox originally found in southern temperate rain forests is considered to have the highest extinction risk of any Chilean mammals.
🌴 Palm Green. With only 40 trees left in the wild, the Carpoxylon Palm is listed as Critically Endangered.
🌳 Redwood Red. The redwood species contains the largest and tallest trees in the world. Endangered due to habitat losses.
NEWS!! Our backers have wished for a black, so we've made it in black 🖤
🦇Bat Black. Fruit bats are critical plant pollinators, and their distribution of seeds from the wild fruit that they eat helps forests grow back. 
71,910 km² of forest is cut down every year to make single-use tissues for the US alone. That's the size of Rhode Island, Delaware, Connecticut, New Jersey, and New Hampshire COMBINED 😥. And this is for something you use ones and throw away. 
By reusing we are eliminating the need for a product that uses our resources, is manufactured, packaged and shipped constantly. In the long run, you save money, save the planet and in this case a whole lot of trees!  
Change our everyday actions in order to change our lives and the world will change with us.
Please help us grow the LastTissue community and reduce the deforestation of our earth. Click on a button below and spread some love for the planet.
Change your habits for the good of the planet in a fuss-free way. Buy LastTissue once, cross single-use tissues off your shopping list forever, and do your bit for the environment. Easy. 
behind LastSwab
Last year we made LastSwab that was crowdfunded with more than 30,000 backers (THANK YOU🙏).
The last year has been quite a ride. We have learned the following, be 100% sure we are shipping plastic🚫 free, be 100% sure we are shipping EU and US-friendly🤝, make all molds before launch, do a test production before launch and make sure to deliver on time or before promises. 
Everything has been set up🚀, we are ready and so excited to share LastTissue with all of you. We just hope that Murphy and his Law don't come around. If he does, we will work around the clock until we've fixed the issues and we promise to communicate openly about everything.
Nicolas Aagaard (left) has created industrial design for a number of years. He is our the-big-picture, this-can-be-scaled📈, rendering expert, excel and business shark designer.
Isabel Aagaard (center) has a background in designing medical equipment. She is our graphical quality first, GIF fanatic, coffee brewing, scissor cutout ✂️, eco collaborative designer.
Kåre Frandsen (right) is trained as a cabinetmaker. He is our hands-on, built-a-set-in-a-day, i-can-use-all-tools🔨, cleaning expert, never negative, real prototype and production expert designer.
At LastObject we are always dedicated to creating sustainable alternatives to single-use items in pursuit of a cleaner environment 🌎. Since our successful launch on Kickstarter with LastSwab our small team has crowned into a handful of Waste Warriors that share the same goal from all over the globe.
-To eliminate single-use items globally- 
In collaboration with
We work with trusted American, Canadian and French partners that have all been sourcing out of China for more than 10 years. They take pride in making sure all their factories have verified certification. Good work conditions, a responsible supply of materials and recycling are all areas that are supported in our factories.
From our last Kickstarter (LastSwab) we learned that tooling (molds) and tests take an awfully long time, so this time everything has been sourced beforehand and all molds tested.
We have even made a test production of 1000 pieces that have been handed out to people for testing and feedback. We have done this so you can receive a high-quality product within three months of the campaign ending.
All pledges are shipped from Denmark with the exception of US addresses, they will be shipped from the US. This way no Europeans or US citizens will be taxed or charged extra VAT.
We are shipping 100% plastic-free.
Please note that people living outside of Europe and The US will be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to their region.
download
As Seen On
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
MANUFACTURING:
•We’ve made a test run of 1000 pieces and found a few improvement for the final product, because of this test we are confident that everything will be going smoothly, but unforeseen things might occur, if this should happen we promise communicate honest about it, please read our updates here on Kickstarter for more information.
•We have chosen the same manufacture as we use for LastSwab + an extra manufacture so if something will cause a delay, we will hopefully still be able to ensure timely delivery.

SHIPPING:
•We will start sending LastTissue boxes out as soon as all orders are packed and sent to our two fulfillment services in Texas (The US) and Copenhagen (Denmark). 
•Please note that if you live outside The US and Europe you will be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region.

PRODUCT GUARANTEE:
•LastTissue comes with a two year warranty. Should you experience problems with defects you can send it back to us, we’ll happily recycle it and send you a new one for free.
•And remember ''There Is No Planet B''
•Please help us spread the word by sharing our links above this.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
The silicone case will last you a lifetime. The tissues can be washed 500 times each. Psst probably longer.
Reusability and recyclability
We are all about reusability, one pack of LastTissues can be used at more than 3000 times. The tissues is Organic cotton and therefore can go into organic trash. The silicone case will last you a lifetime and can be refilled with tissues. The packaging is made from non coated cardboard and paper and we are shipping 100% plastic free.
Sustainable materials
We are using Organic Cotton for the tissues. The Silicone case will last you a lifetime, but if you decide to despose it then it's 100% recyclable at select locations — non-hazardous waste.
Sustainable Distribution
Our fulfillment partners have guarantied us to be shipping 100% plastic free.

campaign.story:
Livestream recording demo on Youtube @ 8 AM EST January 24th 2020. 
 Sound is all around us, all the time. Sometimes we ignore it, sometimes we cherish it. 
But why is sound so important?
We spend everyday hearing and listening, it is part of our lives.  Sound is influential, it can be informative, educational, conclusive, emotive, and many other things for us.
The problem is people remember only 30% of what they hear. Smartphones can do the ‘work’, they are certainly not built to be digital voice recorders. 
So why not try the better solution?
Born from a team of researchers and engineers who spend many hours in front of a computer, TileRec is our constant reminder to take a walk and "stop and smell the roses", so to speak.
We designed TileRec to exceed even our own extremely high personal standards.  

 Thin: Only 1/4 inch thin. Fits easily in the slimmest wallets.
 Small: As small as a piece of a chocolate bar ( 2.48 square inch).
 Light:  The same weight as a US penny (0.5 oz).
 Simple: Simple everything! Easy to use, easy to recharge and easy to playback.
 Long-lasting Battery: 24 hours on one charge. Designed to be used the entire day.
 Surround Recording: 360 degrees recording in a 15 feet range. Meeting, lecture or simple discussion - all sounds are easily captured with HQ clarity.
 Resistant: 100% recycled aluminum casing. Sleek design that blends discreetly in the everyday setup.
When we say "World's Smallest", we mean it. Measuring in at a staggering 1.6 inch in length, and 1/4 inch in height, weighing only 0.5 oz nothing else on the market comes close with the discreet portability offered by TileRec.  
TileRec is so slim and small than it can fit almost anywhere you can think of. It blends discreetly with everyday objects - in your pocket or wallet, between the pages of an agenda, on your desk or even on your child's backpack.
Traditional voice recorders were bulky and uncomfortable, limiting day-to-day activities.   
The idea of a voice recorder so slim and thin that it can be used as a  personal assistant is to improve the daily productivity of its user. And is practically indestructible.
You can drop it, step on it, even run the car over and then resume recording. 
The aluminum casing ensures complete protection for worry-free use.
When you combine these benefits with excellent audio quality, you get a voice recorder that is perfect for lectures, interviews, meetings, and dictations too! 
Most smartphones have a built-in voice recorder app that you can use anytime, so they can do the ‘work’, but certainly are not built to be digital voice recorders. 
Small, discreet and efficient, Tilerec is the latest voice recorder designed by ATTO DIGITAL, created to encompass the ideal balance between form and function. 
So, what makes TileRec so superior to smartphones when it comes to recording?  
TileRec is perfect for anyone that wants to work simpler, faster and better – without compromising quality. 
TileRec is recording Hi-Q MP3, using a 128 kbps bit rate. You can choose to set it to record in continuous mode or in voice-activated mode to capture sounds in a 15 feet range (360 degrees).
In voice-activated mode, the ultra-performant sensor of the microphone will initiate ad start recording only when sounds are detected in the range of the recorder (15 feet) thus avoiding recording long silent periods and saving memory time.
The built-in Li-Po 3.7 V battery (240 mAh) needs only 1.5 hours to fully charge (DC IN 5 V 500mA), even when connected to a computer and will be up and running for more than 24 hours.
Record the entire day then just plug & play all your recordings. 
*no additional software needed
 TileRec can also record while charging so you will not miss any information that matters to you.
Let’s get nostalgic for a hot second. Reflect on a childhood memory, recalling an exact time or event — what you were wearing, who you were with, the sights, smells, tastes. Try to remember how you felt, specific noises like, I don’t know, shrilling crickets layered under siblings’ laughter or, the sound of your mother's voice.
It’s difficult, right? Unless the event was recorded, the memory is likely pretty hazy.  
TileRec is designed to record your daily meetings, activities, and ideas in a non-intrusive way and carries our belief that “wear-ability” is the utmost goal in the design of everyday carry technology. 
You live in a fast-paced world where TIME is MONEY and you are searching for the best tool to improve productivity and save time?  
 Here are  some situations  TileRec can help you with:  
The perfect solution for professional use
Lawyers may use them to take voice notes while preparing cases, while criminal investigators record digital notes in the field, and doctors use it to record important info about cases. If you make a living in one of these fields, you may find a portable voice recorder invaluable.  
Using a voice recorder has never been easier. 
So why not take the leap into the digital era? Stop wasting time and paper trying to keep track of all the information. 
Just slide one button to record and enjoy the Tilerec experience.
Use the USB cord to connect your TileRec to any computer and select the audio file you need to playback.  It's just that simple: 
PLAY

Check on Soundcloud the audio sample recorder with TileRec.
The Li-Po built-in battery of TileRec is re-chargeable for more than 1000 charging cycles. It takes only 1.5 hours to fully charge the battery, then it can record continuously or in voice-activated mode, for more than 24 hours. 
Have you ever wondered how much paper we use yearly? 
Americans use 85,000,000 tons of paper a year; about 680 pounds per person. The average household throws away 13,000 separate pieces of paper each year. 
Using TileRec for your daily notes and meetings saves time, effort and also 1 tree/ person/ year from becoming paper. 
All this while increasing productivity, saving time and keeping all your information organized with time and date stamp!

 Find a reward that works for you and your family, office or team, there's something for everyone.  We are particularly excited to offer fast shipping in the US and EU.
 This is ATTO DIGITAL's  2nd product launched via crowdfunding.  We always deliver. We've learned a ton over our first Kickstarter, helping develop a good sense of our capabilities and timeline.
The satisfaction of our users is paramount!
That is why we want to make sure that when you enter the ATTO  family you feel the care and support.
Our Customer Service team is  24/7 available to offer support in more than 5 languages. And because we really do believe in the manufacturing quality of our recorders, we offer lifetime warranty for TileRec.
We, the ATTO DIGITAL team, have more than 10 years of combined experience in designing, producing and selling sound recorders and surveillance equipment.
Download Press Kit 
Our mission and passion are to listen, so it is also paramount for us to listen to our customers' feedback to better understand how the ideal mini voice recorder should be. 
 Our team is ready - so is the manufacturing - now we just need you! 
It has been a long adventure. From brainstorming to product design, engineering, and branding, it has been a trying, monumental amount of time, conviction and expertise.
It has been a stressful, exciting and thrilling experience to design a product from scratch. We want you to be part of our experience! 
This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 1000+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $430M raised between them.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We have been working non-stop the for last 3 years developing this product and we feel that the amount we are trying to raise is realistic with what is needed for fulfilling the project. We know that the Kickstarter journey is a long one and that there might be several surprises along the way - including foul weather, or maybe even (shock!) our phones running out of battery.

Unfortunately, there are always risks involved in getting a product from the prototype phase to the market, but we have done everything possible to minimize these risks for our backers. Extensive planning has gone into the costs needed for raw materials, labor and shipping and we feel confident we will be able to meet our outlined delivery goals.

Our biggest challenge is the timely delivery of all of our components. In order to keep TileRec at such a small size, parts must be assembled simultaneously, meaning if one shipment gets delayed, our entire process may get slowed down. Hopefully, everything goes according to plan, but if not, we have multiple suppliers for each component, always ready with a plan B!

The second biggest concern is quality control. While we are using the best manufacturer in China who was the previous supplier for one of the top international consumer electronic brands, we need to inspect each TileRec to guarantee 100% satisfaction. This dedication to detail is time-consuming, yet necessary to ensure a quality product.

We promise to keep all of our backers informed if anything happens or our timeline changes! If we encounter anything that might affect the product, its development, and/or shipping date, we will make sure to notify you about it with frequent updates. This project is our #1 priority and we will do everything we can to bring the TileRec to its full potential.

_
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hi everyone,
The end of May is now close and many of you didn’t submit the CrowdOx Survey yet.
The deadline to submit the survey is May 31st. It is really important to submit the completed survey as quickly as possible in order for us to resume fulfillment for all of you.
We would like to give special thanks to all of you for being so awesome, patient, and understanding with the current situation. Although we work 24/7 to keep in contact with the postal services worldwide and make sure all parcels are getting delivered in a timely timeframe, we cannot expedite the process.

Hi awesome backers,

 We hope you’re all staying safe during these strange times.

 After China Post stopped shipping internationally we had to find alternative providers and this took us a bit longer than expected. It has been a difficult time for postal services, with many flights being canceled, impacting airmail across the globe.

Hi awesome backers,
Even if many of you have already received their rewards and filled our hearts with awesome feedback, some are still waiting to receive their TileRecs. We do understand this but at the same time, we do have to ask for your patience. 
Business is not as usual for many domains, transportation included. Despite our continued efforts, there are fewer international flights, while efforts are directed more to ship essential supplies. Also, some countries, like the United Arab Emirates, Philippines, Norway, Rusia, India, Switzerland, Chile etc., have paused their postal service for individual packages, so even if we did ship the packages, there are pending transportation.

updates.update_userinfo: Project Update: Shipping and new Software
updates.update_content:
Hi all,
We know that all of you who helped make this project are excited about getting your rewards as we receive a lot of messages and inquiries from you regarding shipping dates and tracking numbers. 
As you know, we started shipping late March and some of you already have their rewards delivered.

Hi AWESOME backers,
Many of you are asking about shipping TileRec, especially since - considering the global pandemic - many restrictions were applied by several countries.
We do hope all of you understand that the global situation is affecting us all in many ways and that, given the current situation and restrictions (that change sometimes from one day to another) we do our best to adapt and make sure we keep our promise to you.

Hi AWESOME backers,
Many of you are asking about shipping TileRec, especially since - considering the global pandemic - many restrictions were applied by several countries.
We are happy to let you know that we managed to meet our promise and already started shipping. First backers that will be able to get the Kickstarter TileRec are from Japan, Singapore, Taiwan, Hong Kong and China. We are in the process of updating the tracking numbers for each of them. Their rewards were shipped starting Monday, this week.

Hi AWESOME backers,
We managed to get the first round of TileRec(s) to selected beta testers to experience and play with and everything is progressing well. 
The main thing that we are focusing on at this point is consistency. There are a lot of steps in the process of making the TileRec, so together with the factory, we continue to update production to ensure that they can continue to reliably manufacture the devices without high scrap rates.

Just a Friendly Reminder!!
Hey guys! campaign.story:
ENGLISH🇬🇧
1 smartphone case = 3kg of plastic
SELECT YOUR DESIGN
GHOST NET EDITION
PLASTIC EDITION
GRAVITY EDITION
Did you know that we throw around 1 billion plastic phone cases every year? And that we throw 8 million tons of plastic waste every year into our oceans?
Plastic situation in the ocean
Gravity Wave is a project created by young social entrepreneurs that have decided to act so that the numbers you just read start decreasing.
Gravity Wave team: Norberto, Amaia y Julen
We want to change how things work for good and we have a very clear objective: Empty ALL the plastic from the Mediterranean Sea. Not only we want to recollect it, but we want to transform that waste into valuable products.
Two years ago we founded our first phone accessories company. We were producing phone cases, ring holders, USB… and all of our products were made out of plastic. We realised that in the smartphone industry everything gets outdated very fast and especially phone cases, 1 billion units that are thrown away every year because of this (some of them even inside their plastic packaging!) We took the decision of turn the whole business around. How could we be contributing to this negative impact on our lovely planet?  
Plastic recycling
We realised that oceans are full of plastic (8 million tons end up there every year) and it is causing the whole marine ecosystem to collapse. We started thinking about solutions, and how we could collect all this plastic waste, as 70% is at the bottom of the ocean and we do not have the resources to remove it. Moreover, thousands of species are dying because of this.
Impact of plastic waste in animals
We needed people that had the knowledge and the way… Of course, the fishermen! We then spoke with some of them and realised that every day they collected marine litter but didn’t know what to do with it, and that's when we met our now partner Lefteris Arapakis, founder of Enaleia, a sustainable fishing school that has been operating for more than 3 years in Athens, Greece, where they show local fishermen how to collect waste from the sea. When they go out to fish, they dedicate part of their time to fish plastic waste and afterward they bring it back to the harbour and drop it in our containers. We then pay them for every KG they extract and we take care of the rest of the process. 
We already have more than 130 boats in Greece which are now called #plasticfishers and have collected over 50 tons of marine litter! Along 2020 we are will start to work with the fishermen in Italy and Spain so we can continue cleaning the Mediterranean Sea.
So far we take care of the collection and supply, but how do we transform it? We started working hand in hand with Crazy & Things, our partners in Spain, who have been creating, developing and patenting products for more than 10 years. Recently they created Tecnikoa 3D filaments, a project focused on developing and producing 3D filaments. We had been working together in our previous mobile phone accessories company for a long time developing products, and at that time we decided to go one step further becoming partners of Gravity Wave S.L.
Together we got the recycling factory in Alicante, where we select, clean and cut into small pieces that are ready to be reused for creating new products. We then send it to the Crazy & Things factory (also in Alicante), where we produce 3D filament and smartphone cases. 
We already have the first prototype created in our 3D printer with a filament made out of Ghost Nets collected from the sea.
PLAY

We have created a business model that recycles and reuses marine litter to transform it into valuable products. But how do we close the circle? Can we achieve a fully circular economy model?  
Three step manufacturing process
All the cases that we sell, if the user no longer wants them, can bring it to our collecting points all over Spain and will get a great discount for the next purchase of Gravity Wave products. With all the collected cases, we again do the recycling process and give them many more uses until they are no longer recyclable, then we transform it into energy with a 0 emissions certificate.
The idea to create this Kickstarter campaign is to produce the 6 needed molds to launch the first 13 phone model cases. By offering more models we reach to more people to whom we provide a sustainable alternative creating like this bigger impact that allows us to collect more and more marine litter every day. 
In Gravity Wave we create sustainable alternatives for our daily life products so that the consumer knows where all these products come from and how they impact the global climate crisis. But we are not selling charity, we are selling quality.
Technical specifications
Buying 1 Gravity Wave case, you contribute to extract 3KG of plastic from the Mediterranean Sea, and moreover, you contribute to sustainable fishing, empower plastic recycling, support local production, local job creation and of course the development of social projects.
Now we need you so that Gravity Wave becomes a reality.
Contribute to this campaign and be one of the people leading the climate revolution!
Join the Wave!
 ESPAÑOL🇪🇸 
1 funda = 3kg plástico
ELIGE TU FUNDA
Edición GHOST NET
Edición PLASTIC
Edición GRAVITY
¿Sabías que se tiran alrededor de 1.000 millones de fundas de plástico para móvil al año? ¿Y que vertemos 8 millones de toneladas de plástico al año en mares y océanos? 
Situación del plástico en mares y océanos.
Gravity Wave es un proyecto creado por jóvenes emprendedores sociales que hemos decidido actuar para que las cifras que acabas de leer sean cada vez menores. 
Equipo Gravity Wave: Norberto, Amaia y Julen
Queremos cambiar las cosas de una vez por todas y tenemos un objetivo muy claro: vaciar todo el plástico del mar Mediterráneo. Pero no solamente recogerlo, sino convertir todo ese desecho en productos de valor. 
Hace dos años empezamos con una empresa dedicada a la fabricación de accesorios para smartphone. Estábamos haciendo fundas, anillos de sujeción, USB, y todos ellos llevaban algo de plástico. Nos dimos cuenta que en el sector de la telefonía móvil todo es muy pasajero, y las fundas se quedan enseguida obsoletas, así que las que no se venden, se tiran. El mercado de fundas para smartphone tira alrededor de 1.000 millones de fundas al año por no estar al día de los modelos de teléfono. Así que nos replanteamos todo nuestro negocio, ¿cómo íbamos a seguir contribuyendo nosotros a esta causa tan negativa?  
Reciclaje del plástico
Se nos ocurrió que en mares y océanos hay muchísimo plástico, tanto como 8.000.000 de toneladas que se vierten anualmente y que además el 25% viene de redes de pesca o "redes fantasma". Además, miles de especies de animales están muriendo por causa de este desecho. 
Impacto del plástico en animales
Empezamos a darle vueltas y a pensar en cómo podíamos recoger todo ese plástico, ya que el 70% está en el fondo y nosotros no podíamos dedicarnos a pescarlo, teníamos que contar con personas que conocieran muy bien el mar y salieran cada día a pescar. ¡Claro, los pescadores! Queríamos empezar por nuestro mar Mediterráneo, así que hablamos con algunos de ellos y y fue entonces cuando conocimos a nuestro primer socio Lefteris Arapakis, fundador de Enaleia, una escuela de pesca sostenible que lleva operando más de 3 años en Atenas, Grecia, donde muestran a los pescadores tradicionales a recoger residuos del mar. Cuando salen a faenar, dedican parte de su tiempo a pescar plástico y una vez lo traen a puerto lo echan en contenedores, los cuales pesamos, y les compensamos por kg de plástico recogido. En Gravity Wave contamos ya con más de 130 barcos en nuestra sede de Atenas, Grecia, que salen cada día a faenar y a recolectar plástico del mar, ¡y llevamos más de 50 toneladas de residuos recogidos! En 2020 comenzamos con los pescadores de Italia y España para seguir recuperando los residuos del fondo del mar.
Hasta aquí tenemos la parte de recogida y suministro del material, pero, ¿cómo lo transformamos? Comenzamos a trabajar mano a mano con Crazy & Things, nuestros socios en España, quienes llevan más de 10 años creando, desarrollando y patentando productos. Recientemente han creado Tecnikoa 3D filaments, donde desarrollan y producen filamentos para impresión 3D. Llevábamos ya mucho tiempo trabajando juntos y en ese momento decidimos ir un poco más allá pasando a ser socios en esta aventura.
Junto a ellos conseguimos la planta de reciclaje en Alicante, que se dedica a limpiar, seleccionar y trocear el plástico que enviamos desde Atenas en copos y granza (trozos muy pequeños). Más tarde nos lo envían a nuestra fábrica de Crazy & Things situada también en Alicante, donde producimos filamento para impresión 3D y fundas para smartphone.
¡YA TENEMOS EL PRIMER PROTOTIPO IMPRESO EN 3D CON FILAMENTO DE REDES DE PESCA RECUPERADAS DEL MAR! 
PLAY

Con estos pasos, hemos conseguido tener un modelo de negocio que recicla y reutiliza los residuos del mar para convertirlos en productos de valor, pero nos queda una última cuestión: ¿cómo cerramos el círculo? ¿Cómo podemos conseguir un modelo de economía circular completo?
Proceso

Todas las fundas que produzcamos y vendamos, una vez el cliente quiera cambiarlas, podrá llevarlas a puntos de recogida situados en toda España y una vez entregue esa funda, obtendrá un vale de descuento para comprar un nuevo modelo de funda Gravity. Con todas las fundas recogidas, volveremos al proceso de limpieza y troceado para darle "nueva vida" a los productos de Gravity Wave. 
La idea de crear la campaña de Kickstarter nace para producir 6 moldes, necesarios para sacar 13 modelos de teléfono diferentes. Haciendo más modelos llegamos a más personas, a las que ofrecemos una funda sostenible para su móvil generando con esta compra un impacto positivo, ayudando a recolectar cada vez más residuos, ¡hasta que no quede ni 1KG de plástico en nuestro querido mar!
El primer producto desarrollado con este material es LA PRIMERA FUNDA PARA MÓVIL HECHA CON REDES DE PESCA RECOLECTADAS DEL MAR MEDITERRÁNEO. Fundas que no sólo protejan tu móvil, sino que contribuyan directamente a proteger el mar.
En Gravity Wave creamos alternativas sostenibles de productos que consumimos en nuestro día a día, para que personas como tú tengan toda la información de los productos que compran y puedan contribuir a resolver la crisis climática. 
Nos preocupa la sostenibilidad, pero también la calidad. 
Características de nuestras fundas / Cover technical specifications
Comprando una funda de Gravity Wave contribuyes a extraer 3KG de plástico del mar Mediterráneo, además contribuyes a la pesca sostenible y responsable, fomentas el reciclaje de plásticos, la producción local, y por supuesto, la creación de puestos de trabajo y desarrollo de proyectos sociales. 


Escoge el diseño que más te guste y únete al cambio. Ahora te necesitamos para que Gravity Wave sea una realidad. ¡Contribuye a la campaña y sé una de las personas que forme parte de esta revolución!
 ¡Únete a la ola!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Uno de nuestros mayores desafíos será ofrecer diferentes modelos de funda para cada persona que quiera una. 
One of our major challenges will be to offer enough case models for every individual that wants one.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
Utilizamos uno de los materiales más resistentes que hay, redes de pesca, para producir ambos el filamento para impresión 3D y fundas para móviles. 
We are using ghost nets to produce both the 3d filament and the smartphone cases. Ghost nets are one of the most durable and resistant materials.
Reusability and recyclability
Incentivamos a nuestros usuarios a devolver las fundas una vez no las quieran utilizar a cambio de descuentos para comprar otros productos de Gravity Wave.
We encourage our users to give back the covers once they no longer use them, and they will get discounts on other products.
Sustainable materials
El corazón de nuestro proyecto es utilizar materiales y residuos que están en el mar y reciclarlos para transformarlos en productos de valor, salvando a miles de especies marinas en el proceso y restaurando habitats dañados. 
Our project is based on recycled materials. We collect waste from the oceans and give it a new life, saving thousands of species along the way.
Environmentally friendly factories
Nuestro modelo de negocio se basa en la economía circular: los pescadores locales recolectan el plástico, nuestra planta de reciclaje lo limpia y selecciona y más tarde envía a nuestra fábrica de producción también en Alicante donde hacemos filamento para impresión 3D y fundas para móviles. Además, todo el plástico que no podemos reciclar lo enviamos a una planta que aprovecha todo ese material para crear energía con certificado de 0 emisiones. 
Our business model has the whole circular economy: fishermen collect the plastic, our recycling factory cleans it and selects it in Alicante, where we later on produce the 3d filament and smartphone cases. All the plastic that we cannot recycle goes to a factory that uses it all to produce energy with a 0 emissions certificate.
Sustainable Distribution
Y por supuesto, ¿cómo algo que es capaz de proteger un producto tan delicado cono un móvil iba a necesitar un envase? Somos una marca libre de packaging. La funda es suficientemente fuerte como para necesitar algo que la proteja. 
And of course, why would something that protects something so delicate as a phone, need protection? We are a packaging free brand. The case is strong enough for the need of a packaging.
