campaign.story:
“If you are in the market for a wireless speaker that delivers across the board, the Super-M is literally the best we have ever used for the price point, size and durability.” MAGNETIC
The speaker sounds so damn good because it’s got a state of the art Bluetooth 4.0 chipset and 4 full-range, high-performance neodymium drivers complemented with a passive radiator per pair.  COOLMATERIAL
“It easily competes with the best midrange names like the Jawbone Mini Jambox or Soundmatters FoxL DASH 7, which were my favorites until today.” CNET
The product won the CNBC TechCrowd competition with 79% of all votes.
It all started in 2013 when a designer from San Francisco teamed up with a group of acoustic experts and manufacturing veterans, with the vision of creating a line of portable speakers that would challenge the trend of a booming Bluetooth speaker market that packed lots of features into products, but lacked focus on acoustic performance.
We launched NudeAudio last summer with a line of fashion forward portable speakers in three sizes. L for around the house, M to grab and take to the park and S to leave attached to your snowboard jacket or backpack. 
The launch was received with fantastic feedback from the tech, fashion and design communities. Less than a year after launch, we found ourselves selling products in over 40 countries.
The grab-and-go size of M proved to be by far our most popular, so for our next and most ambitious development to date, we decided to explore how far we could take the acoustics in the M size. The result is Super-M.
4 full-range, high-performance neodymium drivers are tightly packed on both sides of the Super-M, with each pair complemented by a passive radiator, totalling 6 drivers.
These are driven by highly efficient amplifiers and a powerful Lithium-ion battery. A state-of-the-art Bluetooth 4.0 chipset ensures the best signal and efficient battery use.
This innovative and unconventional set-up means Super-M can pump out incredible, 360º sound and keep the party going for 8-hours straight, all from a package that fits in your jeans pocket.
The final step was sealing the whole package for IPX-5 waterproof rating and sand-proof so the Super-M can be taken anywhere.
“Tom asked me to audition the NudeAudio Move range in S, M & L against the big-brand competition and I was astonished with the rich, natural sound. I blind-tested the M and a competitor three times the price and the M won hands-down. Super-M takes this performance to the next level."

Hugh Padgham - Record producer for artists such as David Bowie, Genesis, The Police and Sting.
PLAY

Peter Riering-Czekalla, Chief Design Officer, is the creative lead of NudeAudio and is looking after all elements of design and brand experience. Trained as an industrial designer in Germany, he worked at IDEO for almost a decade. During that time, he led teams to develop design and brand strategies for fortune 500 companies like Samsung, Nike, Microsoft, etc. NudeAudio is a reflection of his passion to create simple, yet playful products for the everyday.
Tom Dudderidge, CEO, a serial tech and hardware entrepreneur, spent the last 10-years leading the business that built the largest docking station brand in Europe, GEAR4. Many of this team make up the Hong Kong and China engineering and operations for NudeAudio. Tom’s father Phil is the Chairman of NudeAudio. He started out as live sound engineer for bands such as Led Zeppelin in the 1970s. He then founded Soundcraft, which invented the modern mixing console, and is now Chairman of Focusrite & Novation, leaders in professional audio interfaces, synthesisers and DJ gear.
At NudeAudio we are passionate about our fair price policy, so we're offering a wide-range of rewards where no backer will pay more than $99 - delivered - for a Super-M on Kickstarter, wherever you come from, and whichever colour or collaboration you select. 
UPDATE: FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING (NO EXCEPTIONS!) - OUR PLEDGE TO YOU!
Because of the overwhelming response from international backers, we have now announced that we will ship anywhere in the world with no exceptions. It's always been our intention that nobody pays more than $99 for a Super-M, wherever they come from, and because of the initial success of our campaign we feel we are able to make this pledge ourselves. 
Please note that pledges in California will be subject to sales tax, so please add 9% (pledge $108 for $99 pledge) or we will have to eat it ourselves!
YOU CAN EXTEND AN EXISTING PLEDGE BY SIMPLY ADDING AN AMOUNT AND SENDING US A QUICK NOTE.
We introduced black this spring for our entire product range with great reception. What better color than monochromatic black to launch our Super-M with?
We are introducing seasonal colors in alignment with the latest fashion trends. This fall, we have Petrol, Pine and Plum. Complex but muted in monochromatic style.
Many of you asked for it so we added a Kickstarter edition. Black body with iconic Kickstarter-green cord.
We've also collaborated and handful of our friends and supporters to deliver some Kickstarter exclusive Special Edition designs, which we will be launching during the campaign. Don't worry about your color or Special Edition choice for now, you will only need to decide when we email you later after you've backed us. So keep watching our updates during the campaign to see the different collaboration options as they are released.
The last but certainly not least collaboration we are presenting is with the Kickstarter community itself. We announced to create a community color as a $500K stretch goal, created and decided by the backer community. After many suggestions from everyone, we visualized 9 options and put them out for a vote. Black and Coral was the clear winner. (please note above image is a computer visualization)
As a business centred on our passions for design and music, we like to think that NudeAudio is a contributor to the arts. Our collaborations with other artists and brands are a great opportunity to work with other people's passions too.
David is a London street artist who travels the world, painting murals and creating objects and canvasses. His work can be seen in the streets a few blocks from Kickstarter HQ, as well as in villages in Africa, projects in Kosovo, in Cape Town, Japan and Rotterdam, to name just a few places.
David came to OUR UK office a few weeks ago and painted an amazing mural on the wall. He also agreed to hand paint 20 sets of grilles of Super-M to create a David Shillinglaw Limited Edition especially for Kickstarter backers. These will each be bundled with Limited Edition 'Kingless Kingdom' print.
Limited Edition David Shillinglaw Hand-Painted Super-M plus 'Kingless Kingdom' Limited Edition Single Colour Screenprint (from run of 100)
EXISTING BACKERS PLEASE LOOK AT FAQ BELOW

Below is a short video that we made while David was painting the mural in our offices, I hope you enjoy it and David's unique character.
PLAY

We are talking a lot about protecting the technology inside the speaker against its environment. But let’s not forget that we first need the environment to enjoy the speaker in. So let’s try help protecting it, a little bit at the time.
Introducing the Cuipo special edition. With each unit sold, we will purchase 5 square meters of rain forest for you to own and keep protected against deforestation. You will receive documentation and the geolocation of your personal 5 square meters. Interesting fact is that there is a population of one monkey per square meter. But no, you will not own 5 monkeys!
The main body is kept in a safari green with a contrasting bright red cord to make sure you don't lose it in the jungle.
We are partnering on this with Cuipo, a lifestyle brand dedicated to preserving prime rainforest around the globe. Cuipo was created to inspire the preservation of our planet's most vital ecosystem by empowering individuals and institutions to act and become responsible trustees of our planet.
We are very excited to announce a new Special Edition Super-M collaboration with UK star-DJ, MistaJam.
Working closely with Peter, he designed the duotone black and turquoise Super-M with a slice of colour peeping through the grill, exposing both the MistaJam and Speakerbox logo. The MistaJam presents Speakerbox logo has also been screen printed to the base, and of course finished it off with our trademark NudeAudio cord in turquoise. 
Click the video link below to hear what the man himself has to say about it: 
PLAY

We're pretty excited, and hope you like this new option as much as we do.
In addition to the special editions that we will continue to announce during the campaign, we are delighted to announce an exclusive Limited Edition today, live from Miami, Florida. 
In celebration of late night parties, sleeping in, weekend getaways, staycations, singing in the shower and breakfast in bed, we are stripping down and teaming up with one of our favorite hotels, The Standard, to bring you a custom speaker evocative of our worlds. 
With their devotion to design and innovation, The Standard are at the forefront of the industry with five properties in New York City, Los Angeles and Miami. And in true Nude style, The Standard's Limited Edition Super-M is in the buff, colored monotone nude.
The Standard X Nude speaker is available to all of our Early Bird backers, (select it when we ask for your color choice), and there are only 100 limited edition pledges available so pledge quickly before they disappear.
Yelle is a recording artist from France, currently touring the USA. They have released 2 albums, Pop Up and Safari Disco Club, with a third album, Complètement Fou, eagerly anticipated. NudeAudio loves their brand of dance floor friendly European disco-pop, and the band have designed their Yelle Special Edition Super-M in a standout bright blue with red silk screened logo on the base to match their album cover.
PLAY

We've had a great number of requests for a bike mount for Super-M, so we decided to offer one. Since it hasn’t been designed yet, it’s a wonderful opportunity for a collaborative design project. Join us for the ride by pledging $124 which includes the bike mount plus Super-M.
Above picture is a functional prototype to proof the idea. Look and feel is to be designed in the coming weeks.
THE PROCESS: We just started thinking about the design and what you see on the picture above is only our first prototype. We will facilitate the process gathering your input and translating it into ideas that will be shared with you to feedback on. Please share your initial insights and ideas, as well as feedback on the first prototype here. Based on your thoughts over the next few days, we will be iterating on the design and present new iterations before the end of the campaign.
THE DESIGNER: NudeAudio partnered up with Adam Reineck, ex IDEO, bike design superstar who helped design the Faraday bike as well as the Spurcycle Bicycle Bell. Both of which gained a lot of appraise across the bike and design community.
We had a lot of comments on ideas for additional colors. Extra thanks to Henri who even sent some designs over. Every color has a minimum order quantity and while we always liked to have more colors, we had to draw a line. 
If we reach 500K, we'll add one color and have YOU design it. We will invite everyone to tell us their color idea, collect them all and visualize the most popular suggestions. At the end of the campaign, we'll put them out for vote to all backers and produce whatever turns out to be the community favorite.
Earlier in the campaign we revealed that there was a candidate for an upgraded driver for Super-M. Packed with four, even a small cost increase is multiplied 4 times, and the potential cost increase to include the upgraded drivers was high. But there was a noticeable improvement and we set a stretch goal at $550k, as we need the volume to get a good price from the supplier and justify the margin hit.
We're pretty certain that we'll hit the goal, but we're uncomfortable leaving you guys hanging and wondering whether or not the upgrade is coming. Furthermore, while we are doing parallel tuning processes for both driver types, it's important that we lock it down soon so we can ensure we don't have any procurement hiccups.
So we've decided today that we are going to guarantee the stretch goal now, which will make you guys happy, whilst reducing supply chain risks, and make communication easier over the coming days.
Tom & Peter demonstrate and challenge the IPX5 Waterproof rating
PLAY

Peter takes a look at the hardware and explains some of the functionality.
PLAY

OK, you got this far, so we figured you're really interested (or have time on your hands). Either way, here's a 5 minute video of Tom unboxing and reacting to the latest prototype, demoing the simple functionality, and describing the final steps of development, all in a single (first) take!
PLAY

  It's a cruel world, and the conventional way to launch new brands and products in this very crowded market takes a lot of effort and money and can be very risky.
We know that when people hear our philosophy and our story, when they see and hear our products, it really resonates. Every NudeAudio owner that we've talked to is a big fan. But we don't have the resource to market in the traditional way with advertising and big in-store presence.
Kickstarter, and you, our crowd, seems to be the very best way for us to spread the word. By offering the product at a very fair price, with shipping included worldwide, we hope that you guys will give a a little back by sharing with your friends, giving us great feedback, and joining our mission for better sound.
Entering mass production for a high-volume consumer product like Super-M is a big investment. We need to raise at least $75,000 to fund the balance of our minimum production run (hence the target), and we've got access to parts for up to 10,000 units immediately if the campaign is big success, before hitting long lead times for additional parts.
We'll use you pledges to get into mass production and use the residual funds and the momentum of the campaign to get our brand out into the big, bad world and stand up to our big-bucks competition. Thank you!
Disclaimer: There is no disclaimer. We decided to give everyone free world wide shipping!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
At the time of writing, Super-M is very close to pilot production, with virtually all hardware parts developed. The audio tuning process described in the video above is commencing. At this stage of development, the risks associated with the development project have been almost entirely eliminated.

There are also inherent supply chain risks which need to be managed, but we have secured parts for the first 10,000 units of production so these risks are controlled at least for this level of production. Our contract manufacturing partner is a large, experienced company with members of our respective teams have long-lasting relationships going back 10 years.

Quality is also something that needs close management in any manufacturing process. Our quality team, based in Hong Kong and Shenzhen, follow professional processes to ensure that quality is managed throughout the design, development, supply chain and manufacturing process.

Disruptive Hong Kong, parent company to NudeAudio, will take responsibility for fulfilment of all product pledges, which will be shipped direct to our backers worldwide directly from Hong Kong as soon as production has been completed.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Dear NudeAudio friends and backers,

Today we received confirmation that the Yelle and MistaJam collaboration Super-Ms have arrived in our Hong Kong warehouse, and are ready to ship out to our distribution centres world-wide. Black and Coral Super-Ms have left the factory and will arrive in Hong Kong over the weekend.

Finally, for a bit of Friday fun...

By popular demand, we've uploaded the extended version of the 'interrogation scene' from our last update. Enjoy, and feel free to share on the comments boards of other projects you've backed.

Thanks once again for your support and patience.

campaign.story:
MEET TYNY
Hi everyone, I'm Tom with my first design project!
For the last 5 years, I’ve commuted by bike from Oakland, California to work in San Francisco. During these commutes I'm regularly faced with the challenge of carrying stuff while biking. Everything from phones to packages and bike locks there are many challenges to carrying and accessing stuff while biking.
In this project I wanted to design simple solutions for some of these everyday bike commute problems. Over the last year, I’ve come up with over 50 designs and 30 functional prototypes. Sketch after sketch, proto after proto, I’ve narrowed it down to 3 simple designs I call TYNY Tools Collection 1.
KEY CLIPS
Originally designed to quickly locate and access my bike lock keys, Key Clips can be used to attach anything onto your bike or backpack. You can use it indoors for electronic cord management or bundling stuff together. Made with super strong industrial silicone and a unique swivel carabiner design you can use one or multiple units to strap down many many things. Comes in 3 great colors and 2 different sizes.
Perfect Keychains
Bike Rack Straps
Backpack Attachment Straps
Yoga Mat Straps
Available in 2 sizes / 3 colors
Small Length 7 in
Medium Length 11 in
SWIVEL CLIPS
I took the unique swivel carabiner design from the Key Clips and joined it together with a twin. Two carabiners merged into one simple design that swivels, expands the functionality over the traditional carabiner. Hang, store, clip and organize anything you want. Comes in 3 great colors and 3 different sizes.
Keys
Clip Water Bottles to Backpacks
Hang Lanterns
Available in 3 sizes / 3 colors
Small 1/2" x 1 1/2" 
Medium 1" x 2 3/4"
Large 1 1/2" x 3 1/2" 
LOCK BANDS
Made with the same industrial silicon material as the Key Clips, the Lock Bands come with a small locking clip perfect for wrapping your bike pump around your bike tube, attaching your smart phone onto handle bars or wrapping any electrical chords together. You can join multiple rings together for the right size you need. Comes in 3 great colors.
Managing Electrical Chords 
Attach Phones to Bike Handle Bars
Attach Frame Pumps to Bikes
Available in 3 colors
Diameter 2 3/4"
WHAT WE NEED
Now that we've completed the design process, we have to navigate the expensive process of manufacturing and producing this product. While we're close to entering production, your contributions will help fund the final tooling molds and material costs. Combined, these expenses make it difficult for a small company like Tyny Tools to design and produce an innovative product. With your help we can meet our goal of $15,000 and be well on our way to bringing these amazing products to market for you!
REWARDS
INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING
International backers will be responsible for applicable tariffs and customs fees.
PRODUCTION SCHEDULE
We’ll ship in Summer 2014. Here's our schedule for delivery:
Early July: Place first order.
Mid July: First production run.
Mid August: Receive and ship first batch.
THANK YOU
A shout out to everyone who has supported and made TYNY TOOLS what it is today! A special thank you to Tae Kim and Alexei Tcherepanov at Alite Designs and Boreas Gear for all their advice and support.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
I've been working on manufacturing in the outdoor industry for almost 10 years. Throughout that time I've worked closely and have built a great relationship with my manufacturing partner for this project which has a long-standing reputation for producing premium quality products in the outdoor industry.

Given the high cost of materials, manufacturing, and minimum order quantities from the factory, the biggest challenge I face in bringing TYNY Tools to market is funding. The manufacturing timeline is set and tooling can begin immediately pending a successful campaign. I'm confident that with your help, I'll be able to meet the expectations for these products.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Tyny Tools Friends Launch New Kickstarter Project: Gami Bags
updates.update_content:
Hi past backers of Tyny Tools. This is Tom Newth. Thank you for all who have visited our new Tyny Tools website. Your support has been fantastic during the website’s initial launch, so thank you again.
As many of you know, I’m friends and studio mates with Alite Designs and Boreas Gear. The lead designers for both companies have been working on a side project called the Gami Bag: a duffle that can change sizes from 30 to 45 to 55 liters. This is a special project that utilizes the folding principles of origami to create a unique shape-shifting bag for urban trips and adventures.
It would be really great if you could give them a look and maybe some support. They also have included Tyny Tool products for their stretch rewards.

Hello TYNY Tool backers!
We are proud to announce we've officially launched our online store! You can now order our products online, and we'll ship them to you by mail. As a token of our appreciation, we're offering a special discount code that will get you 20% off your next order.
Enter the code "KICKSTARTER" on the cart page to get your special discount!

Hey Backers,
Many have been asking about additional quantity for friends and family and I have some good news that there is a limited quantity available now at www.alitedesigns.com. They have some great outdoor gear and if you use the code TYNYTOOLS at checkout you can snag 30% off your purchase just in time for Christmas.
* Offer expires January 31st 2015

Thank you everyone for all your positive comments. It has taken a lot of work and your patience to get this off the ground and It's really rewarding to hear you're finding new uses for these products. If you're on Instagram please post your pictures and tag us #tynytools with all the great uses that you have found over the last couple of weeks. 
We were a few orders short and had some shipping problems and I've been reaching out to those that have not yet received their rewards. Some of you have contacted me and if you have not heard from me directly I'll be in touch shortly.

Good news everyone,
Tyny Tools arrived last weekend and we've been working overtime the last few days to package them up. The first orders started shipping out yesterday so many of you will be receiving them shortly. I want to thank everyone again for their support and patience with the delays in production. I'm really excited to finally get this in your hands and look forward to hearing from you.

Great news everyone! The production order for Kickstarter is finally on its way here. It's scheduled to arrive Friday in San Francisco. We'll be packing the orders this weekend and shipping early next week. If you have any address changes please make sure you log in to your KS account and change the address by Friday. I'll let everyone know once we are finished packing and the orders are shipping.

Hi Backers,
Wanted to give everyone an update. Unfortunately the product still hasn't shipped to the US. It's a week by week waiting game where I'm pushing the factory to finish and ship. Right now everything is finished and assembled except the small Key Clips and the whistles. They've assured me it will be ready to ship next Monday or Tuesday. I'll let everyone know once it's in the air and again when the packages are shipped and on their way out to everyone. Thanks again for all your patience.

Hi Everyone,
Unfortunately, production has been delayed about another week. All the parts have been delivered to the factory and are now in final assembly and inspection. I appreciate your patience and will let you know of any further delays and as soon as I receive them.

I wanted to share a few pics of the product at the factory and give an update on production. Production is in its final stages and assembly is in process. It's getting so close now for our first production shipment. We did run into a few more delays that is going to hold up the shipment for about another week. Rewards should be shipping from the factory around the 1st of October now and as soon as they are received we'll be frantically fulfilling the orders. Once it lands in San Francisco I'll let you all know. Thanks again for your patience.
Regards Tyny Tools

Hey backers,
Sorry for the delay in updates. I've been working with the factory to see what can be done to speed up the process. Materials have been ordered and the final tool is on order. Production will begin early next month. The bulk production should be ready by October but I'll be working with the factory once production begins to pull some of the product early to fulfill your orders. I'll keep you posted with any further delays and once the product is on it's way I'll let everyone know.

campaign.story:
The RMDLO folding colander open and closed.
Not just a colander but can also be used for steaming.
So versatile and portable, why not take it outdoors.
“We've all been there...having only one use, stowing the colander away always seems like wasting space...where on Earth do I put this cumbersome, bulky kitchen utensil?”
The RMDLO Colander (strainer) is a true breakthrough in kitchenware design. We have spent 5 years tinkering, problem solving and innovating to reach the stage we are at now….and we are proud of the results from our labour. Through an innovative and unique fold-a-bowl design, the RMDLO Colander is capable of folding closed to a fraction of its in use size, making it a modern kitchen utensil ideally suited for anyone with space saving in mind.
The Fold-A-Bowl Tech
Obsessed with origami and geometry, we were convinced the humble colander could be folded up. So we came up with RMDLO’s Fold-A-Bowl technology (patent pending). This design concept allows several stainless steel sheets to be effortlessly collapsed in on top of one another at the flick of a wrist.
Storage Made Easy
Thanks to the Fold-A-Bowl technology, the RMDLO Colander is very easy to store, especially when compared with its more traditional cousin. Closed, the colander is just 1.6cm thick and can be easily slid into a cutlery drawer, back-pack or alternatively, hung (using one of its O handles) from a nail or peg on the wall. What better way to enjoy the RMDLO Colander’s contemporary design then by prominently displaying it on your Kitchen wall for all to admire! 
Flexibility for the Chef
Another problem that RMDLO set out to solve was the complete inflexibility that plagues the rigid design of the more traditional colander. Imagine the scene...your pasta has been properly strained and then you try to guide it onto your plate and...it slides out in one big mass, spilling everywhere! So frustrating! Thanks to the RMDLO Colander’s flexible design, it is possible to squeeze it together with your fingers, forming a basket shape which will allow you to simply guide the food onto your plate.....with no messy margins for error!
Simply squeeze together in order to pour into small containers.
Safe and Easy to Clean
We take the safety of all our designs very seriously. The RMDLO Colander is made from non-toxic kitchen grade materials. The stainless steel is specially heat treated before being rolled to remove any impurities. The O rings are made from BPA free non pollutant plastics. The colander is easy to clean either by hand or thanks to its corrosion free properties and compact size, it is also dishwasher ready.
Are Looks Important? Absolutely!
At RMDLO we believe so. The RMDLO Colander encapsulates everything that we hold dear in our brand – quality, design and especially, space saving. Precision cut stainless steel sheets infused with beautifully crafted plastic rings, allow the RMDLO Colander to put the “Cool” back into colander. Taking pride of place on your kitchen counter or mounted to the wall, it will never look out of place in any kitchen.
For whom?
Thanks to its space saving credentials, the RMDLO Colander is ideally suited towards people with limited space in their kitchen. Whether in a caravan, shared or perhaps just smaller kitchen, the RMDLO Colander will effortlessly slide into a drawer or conveniently hang on the wall using up as little precious space as possible. Alternatively, its versatile and portable design, allows it to be taken out and about with you for picnics, festivals or any other outdoor pursuits. Easy to clean and safe to operate, the RMDLO Colander can be used by people of all ages.
Pledges Explained
Post Kickstarter Plan?
55% - Design refinement, tools & moulds
45% - Manufacturing, packaging & delivery
0%   - Filling the office fridge (or an office...)
The first thing we want to make clear is that no funds will be wasted on salaries, marketing campaigns, filling an office fridge - even an office for that matter! Or any other irrelevant and expensive activity that does not directly benefit backers or improve the product. The key areas where the funds will be spent are as follows –

- Engineering Development – a large proportion of funds raised will be spent on a three month further development programme with a world class engineering firm. Their job is to make the product the very best it could be from a functional and visual perspective.
- Tooling – we need to produce hard tooling to lovingly cut, bend and mould the components required to assemble each colander.
- Manufacturing – setting up production line, assembly, packaging & quality assurance.
- Logistics – we want to ensure that our deliveries to our backers are as quick and efficient as possible.
Market Testing
We don’t get to go out much but we decided to take the RMDLO Colander on the road and ask a few people what they thought. In practice the “few people” turned into hundreds and honestly, it is hard to quantify the positive reaction! Not a single person that we showed and tested the colander on walked away without a smile on their face or agreeing that they would “definitely buy one of those”. Some of the most commonly used comments/questions were as follows –
“Where and when can I buy one of those?” – All in good time my friend.
“Now that is cool!” – Indeed.
“Is it stainless steel? – Yes, only the best will do.
“Is that a sex toy?” – Errrmmmm, I need to go now!
No, we can’t produce statistical evidence but please do watch the video above.
Who is Behind RMDLO?
Ran, Industrial designer/Co-founder
Hola! I’m Ran and the inventor behind the RMDLO colander. In my career I've had a chance to design many different objects, from shoes & toys up to mobile phones & TVs. I've had the pleasure of working for Samsung, Dyson and Speedo as part of their innovation teams. Working directly for Dyson's founder, Sir James, was the best of all where I was able to learn so much about what makes a great and functional product. I have taken these lessons with me and ploughed them into the making of the RMDLO Colander. My responsibility @ RMDLO is designing our customers a perfect product :)
Fred, Commercial director/Co-founder
Bonjour, I am Fred. I have been working in product based businesses for the last 8 years. I am obsessed with cool looking and innovative products, an obsession which lead me to co-create RMDLO with my buddy Ran. My responsibilities @ RMDLO are the operational and business aspects of the project, so it is my job to get the products produced and to your door step as quickly and efficiently as possible!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The Product
The colander in its current form is market ready but not to the highest standard that we expect at RMDLO. Therefore it will go into a final design for manufacturing stage with an engineering firm in the 3 months following our campaign of further development work on the product in order to address a small list of design issues that the product currently has. There is no guarantee that the engineering firm will be able to fix all the issues.

Reassurance: Rest assured that the issues are minimal and the engineering firm who would be contracted are one of the world’s foremost firms in the field of product development.

Delays
We will of course do our upmost to ensure that we hit delivery dates, however, as with all pre-order programmes, we must remind fellow pledgers that often delays can occur as a result of unforeseen circumstances. Ships sinking , parts turning out incorrect etc, are all potential risks that if realised will create delays to the project’s deliverables.

Reassurance: Rest assured however, we have a great team with substantial manufacturing experience so the delay risks are minimised. We will also give you updates every two weeks after project funding completion.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Dear Backers,
I hope you are all doing well and enjoying your RMDLOs. Happy Thanks Giving for all you folks in the US :-) 
Ran and I wanted to thank everyone for submitting your photos, we have had some good, great and just plain confusing come through but all are welcome! 
I know we are now nearing Christmas so I just wanted to drop everyone a note to say that if you wanted to adopt [purchase!] another RMDLO (or maybe several) we are currently running a 10% off everything Black Friday deal onsite and believe it or not, Don Corleone even felt the need to drop buy and say his piece:

Dear Backers,
I hope you are all well. I am pleased to confirm that all pre-orders have now been shipped out, phew!
Ran and I are once again overwhelmed with the high level of positive feedback left by fellow backers who have now received their pre-orders. Please keep the feedback coming, it is greatly appreciated.

updates.update_userinfo: Darling.....there is a delivery for you.....oh dear!
updates.update_content:
Dear Backers,
“Wow…..that is a lot of boxes…..” said Ran unto me! On Friday 21st August, our colander stock finally arrived in our possession. Unfortunately a few days late due to UK customs not believing that the products were stainless steel kitchen colanders….testament to the products uniqueness or their stupidity, I guess. We were almost even later due to the delivery driver not seeing the funny side to me producing a cutlery fork when he enquired as to where the fork lift was to unload the 4 pallets on his lorry – sorry Graham from UCH Road Freight Logistics :-(

updates.update_userinfo: Is it a bird? Is it a plane? No....it is 150 boxes of RMDLOs!
updates.update_content:
Dear Backers,
A quick mid week update for you. We had one or two minor delays caused by quality control issues during inspection. These issues had to be resolved pre-shipping and therefore added a few days lead time. We apologise for this.
However, the above aside I am pleased to say that this morning (Hong Kong time) our freight was loaded onto a cargo plane and is currently in transit…maybe somewhere over Russia by now (?). With this news, we estimate to start shipping all orders out to backers from next Tuesday 18th August, which is when the freight arrives at our London warehouse (also known as Ran’s house!).

Dear Backers,
As you would expect from an English summer, it has been consistently raining all week here London. Despite the weather, the RMDLO team are feeling upbeat as ever. Why (you say)? Because we are now closer than ever to getting the finest product we could produce to our fantastic loyal crowd of backers.
Today’s core update is to communicate that for the last 1.5 weeks our Chinese manufacturing partner has been hard at work, stamping, moulding, bending, welding and packaging our fine colanders. We hope for the Kickstarter shipment to be ready in just over a week’s time. The production run will then need to go under AQL scrutiny to ensure it passes quality control and is therefore ready to be freighted. All being well, we hope that by the next update in 2 week’s time, the products will be almost with us in the UK and ready to be turned back around to our patient backers.

Dear Backers,
I hope you are all well. The sun is shining here in London which makes team RMDLO very happy! Despite the sunshine, we have been hard at work finalising the product and packaging for mass production.
Not a huge amount to report in this update. Ran and I signed off the final production samples (very exciting times) which will now be used as master samples for the mass production run. With this milestone achieved, we had a rare moment to reflect on how far the product has come since our project came to a successful funding completion on Kickstarter. Though of course, the final opinion is down to our founding backers, we are very happy with the results of our persistent push to achieve better. Looking at the product sat snuggly in its packaging, I even saw a cheeky smile appear on Ran’s face…..like a proud father :-)

Dear Backers,  
Ran and I want to thank everyone for their kind words of encouragement after the last update and communication of delay. We have worked flat out over the last 2 weeks to see where time savings can be made. We are still looking at second week of August but anywhere that we can save time, we will endeavour to do so.  
There is not a lot to report at present, but I wanted to check in as per our commitment to keep all backers updated. Final tweaks are being made to the plastics design in order to rectify the issues that we were seeing previously. At the same time, our factory are carefully setting up the production line in order to start machining the 2500 colanders that our crowd pre-ordered. This process cannot be rushed so as to ensure quality and safety procedures are adhered to.

Dear Backers,
I hope you are all well.
In today’s update we wanted to be honest with everyone in communicating that there will be a further delay until we are able to ship out your rewards. We were tracking for a late May ship date but unfortunately, over the last few weeks, we have come up against considerable issues with regards to the plastic components which have taken far longer to resolve than anticipated. Shrinkage, deformation and undesirable signs of wear have plagued our plastic efforts and the results have been unsatisfactory hence the requirement for further delay.

updates.update_userinfo: Starting to Take Shape! With Time......
updates.update_content:

I hope you are all well and enjoying the Spring or Autumn months (depending on where you are). The sun has been shining here in London so Ran and I have smiles on our faces.
Delivery Date
I wanted to start off by confirming that the delivery date has now been pushed back to June. Ran and I deeply apologise for this and we appreciate that it is not the news anyone wants to hear, especially after waiting so long. However, we still feel strongly about the reasons for the delay which ultimately amount to being in pursuit of a better product. We came across various issues over the last 3 weeks which we have worked very hard to fix. I outline as follows:

Dear Backers,

most exciting is the first samples with our selected urban green colour!

campaign.story:
Facebook | Twitter
ClickTape going places
The story
As seen on:
Rad and Hungry: "Simple and totally functional. LOVE the ClickTape"
Yanko Design: "...the tape dispenser that you won’t mind displaying on your desk!"
Design42Day: "timeless, smart and beautifully simple."
Engadget.de: "ClickTape ist der vielleicht slickste Tesabandabreißer, den wir je gesehen haben."
TrendsNow: "..un excellent concept de dérouleur de rouleau d’adhésif."
BNR: "..brilliant!"
Nikolai Carels: "A real design classic!"
Unbeige: "ClickTape, a minimalist dispenser that is useful and portable"
Award winning Dutch Design
 A long time ago I set myself the challenge to redesign the conventional tape dispenser. Most tape dispensers are purely functional products and do not really make you smile. Other ‘design dispensers’ loose there functionality in being cool or are just too expensive. I hope you agree that I have found the perfect balance. A tape dispenser that is everything Dutch design stands for: timeless, smart and beautifully simplistic.
Many, many prototypes to get it just right.
The dispenser
After many design sessions I found the ring shape of the tape itself to be the perfect form. This ring is made out of flexible plastic to allow the tape to be clicked into the dispenser. Simplistic, playful and very easy to use. 
ClickTape dispenser: ready to role!
The shape and production are fully optimised over a period of many months. Making one dispenser now only requires 12 grams of plastic. Sustainable it is!
The ClickTape dispenser is designed to stand out on your home or office desk but it is also very portable.
ClickTape: the ideal travel companion
New available Colours
We have selected Black and Blue as our main colours and Turquoise,  Kickstarter Green and Red to be our Backer specials. Check it out!
The colours samples below are from our supplier, this will give each ClickTape dispenser a rich color. 
Color samples (red to be added shortly)
How to use it
Although the project video covers it all, you can find the individual usage steps below.
Adding tape
The ClickTape dispenser is made out of plastic and is designed to be flexible. A role of tape can simply be clicked into the dispenser.
PLAY

Using the tape
The dispenser is fitted with a stainless steel blade for durability and quick action. A small step in the blade helps you to get hold of the tape.
PLAY

Removing the tape
Because of the flexibility of the dispenser it is easy to push or pull out the tape or remaining core.
The tape
The ClickTape dispenser will be sold with a role of 'invisible' tape, but also fits all other tapes measuring (like Scotch or Staples) : 
Tape width 19 mm (3/4 inch). 
Core width 19mm (3/4 inch)  *some 19mm wide tapes have a smaller core width, this may not fit the dispenser.
 Internal diameter of core 26 mm (1 inch) 
The ring shape is designed based on a 60mm (2.36 inch) diameter, which equals a tape length of about 33 meters (1296 inch). It will fit smaller but results in less magic.
Rewards
All rewards include free shipping :-)
Investment
Kickstarter is the ideal platform to get products that require a large investment, like the ClickTape dispenser, to market and available for you!
The 9.500 euro funding does not include any profit and will be used for:
Tooling
Production tooling for injection moulding the dispenser. See Wikipedia for more info on this process: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Injection_molding
Production tooling for the stainless steel blades
Material costs
Raw material costs of plastic and stainless steel
Manufacturing the dispensers and blades
Many meters of tape
Shipping costs
Packaging and shipping costs
Planning
The Kickstarter campaign will run for one month. If we are able to reach our goal, tooling will be initiated in June. The tooling of the metal moulds for the dispenser will take up most of the lead time. Once the tooling is completed and fine-tuned production can be started. Shipping time will depend on your location but the ClickTape dispenser is not afraid of flying :-).
Questions?
That's all there is to say. We will try to keep the process as simple and smooth as the ClickTape dispenser itself. Feel free to contact us if you are left with any questions.
Thank you for your interest in this exciting project!
 Let's roll!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Producing plastic parts by means of injection moulding is a specialised form of manufacturing but very common for many house hold products. We are confident in our abilities to deliver this project on time and with great quality. Our previous experience in manufacturing consumer products makes us prepared for the unforeseen challenges we may encounter during the production process. We have previously manufactured injection moulded parts with our selected supplier.

Keep in mind there are always issues that can arise, such as having to run multiple runs during the tooling process to fine-tune the tooling or to optimise the assembly or product finish. 

We are committed to make the ClickTape dispenser both fantastic in form and function.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Before scientific and technological breakthroughs, many believed the world was flat. Now, thanks to these two forces the world is in fact becoming considerably flatter, at least in the land of product design!
Introducing BULBING, a 2D LED lamp that forces you to rethink your everyday objects and raise a smile.
3D becomes 2D - 5mm thick acrylic glass
I am a product designer that works to preserve the old and the familiar and translate it into the “New World.” Bulbing is a development of my earlier works, using 3D wire-frame images and transferring them onto 2D materials, to create functional and delicate design pieces that trick the eye!
Acrylic glass carving
Now you can look at your lamps in a whole new light.
Detailed, accurate, fine lines help to create the optical illusion
Great OPTICAL ILLUSION! - 100% FLAT!
BULBING is an elegant light that will add a COOL DESIGN element to any room.
What appears to be 3D is in fact 2D making it functional and helping you to SAVE SPACE.
You can surprise friends and family with the element of OPTICAL ILLUSION!
VERSATILE use for the whole family, it can even be a fun piece for the kid’s at night.
BULBING uses a warm LED light, which is ENERGY-EFFICIENT, lasts up to 50,000 hours, and doesn’t overheat.
It is available with CHANGEABLE designs, so you can choose a light to suit your mood.

BULBING has been made combining man-made fibres, natural materials, and both machinery and artisan handwork, which unite to create design harmony.
Calming night-light
The changeable design is made from an acrylic glass sheet, which is known for its incredible light transmitting properties (more than glass and plastic!) The base, is made from high-quality plywood birch. And the light is LED, with a lifespan of 50,000 hours, a warm glow, and won’t get hot.
Sunlight only! Beautiful in day time
By combining machine work with hand-crafting, the wooden base is cut using a CNC machine, which is then finished by hand: sanding the wood and applying a varnish.
The acrylic glass design is created using a laser machining process.
 All circuitry is wired, adhering to the highest electric standards. Upon placing the acrylic glass design in the lamp’s base (where the LED is positioned), the light breaks through the etched surface.
Production made 10km radius
Mass
Bed-side light
I have designed this lamp to be changeable, all you need to do is lift out the 2D shape from the base and replace it with a new design, keeping the product ever-changing to suit the room, person, or mood. 
All 5 designs - 1 wooden base - for various designs!
  3 new designs!
BULBING
BULBING - #Skull
BULBING - #Spiral
BULBING - #Baloons
BULBING - #StarryNight
BULBING - #Tunnel
BULBING - #TeddyBear
BULBING - #Galaxy
Thank you Kickstarters!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
In 2013, we launched a successful Kick Starter project which delivered on time. Now, we have a new production plan and are ready to go!

During the design and production of Bulbing I choose professionals to help create my lamps. In order to reach the ultimate results -- accuracy, proper materials, different kinds of wood, plastic, glass, etc. -- I chose the best factories and men to do the work.

Two reasons why I decided to produce locally:

• To support local businesses and the private sector, while still managing to keep production costs low.
• Local production also means that I can be present during all stages of the manufacturing process for quality assurance.

I predicted that the biggest challenges would be adding the finishing touches to Bulbing, such as varnishing the wood and assembling the final product; and so I decided to do these at my studio, to guarantee that each lamp turns out to perfection.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
"Easy to carry. Gorgeous, minimalistic, design" ~ GadgetSin
"Battery cases and external batteries are bulky. Enter the TravelCard"~ App Advice
"The TravelCard keeps traveler's phones juiced on the go"~TruTower
"Handy and essential"~Trendhunter
"Solves the common problem of running out of power on smartphones"~RunAroundTech                                                            
"The TravelCard has already achieved initial MFi (made for iPhone) approval."~TUAW                                   
"Now you won't have to deal with cables or adapters on the go."~MikeShouts
"The ultimate charger for those on the road."~The Expeditioner
"Fits perfectly in your wallet, Compact enough to be carried anywhere"~CrazyEngineers
"The TravelCard's extra hours of battery are a godsend."~PhoneArena
THE PROBLEM:
People love their Smartphones - until they run out of power.  Usually at the worst possible time:  Traveling. Outdoors. During a blackout. Or having car trouble.
THE SOLUTION:
With the TravelCard™ you always have reserve power available, in your wallet. The TravelCard™ gives you:
THE TRAVELCARD™ IS SMALL AND SLIM
It's the exact size of a credit card, only 3/16" (4.77mm) thick and weighs just 2 oz. (56.7g). You can say goodbye to annoying cables and bulky portable chargers.
THE TRAVELCARD™ WILL BE MANUFACTURED IN LIGHTWEIGHT AIRCRAFT GRADE ALUMINUM IN FOUR COLORS — White, Black, Silver, and Sapphire Blue
 CHARGING IS EASY
Simply slide out the integrated iPhone™ Lightning™ or the Micro USB charging cable, insert into your phone's port, push the power button and you're good to go.  LED lights indicate the power level.
AVAILABLE IN TWO VERSIONS :
 Travelcard In Use
TECHNICAL INFORMATION
Size: 3.38 x 2.13 x 3/16 inch (85.9 x 54.1 x 4.77 mm)
Weight: 2 oz. (56.7g)
Shell: Anodized aluminum 
Battery: Lithium Polymer
Battery Capacity: 1300 mAh
PERFORMANCE:
Talk Time: 5 hours
Internet Usage: 4 1/2 hours
Stand By Time: 98 hours
Time to charge the TravelCard: 75 minutes
Time to charge SmartPhones: 32 minutes
THE TRAVELCARD™ IS PATENT PENDING
Patent Drawings
APPLE HAS APPROVED THE INITIAL TRAVELCARD™ DESIGN. 
The TravelCard™ prototype has been approved by Apple, and has been assigned a product development number:
PRODUCTION OF THE TRAVELCARD™ WILL BE IN AN APPLE CERTIFIED FACTORY
Upon approval by Apple, the retail packaging will state that the product is MFI certified.
iPhone™ and Lightning™ are registered trademarks of Apple Inc.  No endorsement is implied.  Android™ is a registered trademark of Google Inc.  No endorsement is implied.
Initial Sketches
 Initial CAD File And Prototype Drawing From Our Electrical Engineer
 Initial Prototype: Electronics/Circuit Board/Battery
WORKING PROTOTYPE
Numerous factory tests have been trouble free in providing instant charging to both iPhone and Android phones.
If you like the TravelCard™ concept, please share our Kickstarter page with your friends: 
On Twitter
On Facebook
Via Email
Why we chose Kickstarter?
Kickstarter has a history of being the ideal platform to launch breakthrough new products.  We felt from the start that Kickstarter would be the ideal place to launch The TravelCard™.  Support and feedback from the Kickstarter community on The TravelCard™ and future products will be invaluable.
GO DESIGN was founded with the aim of producing products that provide problem-solving solutions for busy people.  The TravelCard™ and other products we have on the drawing board accomplish this goal by taking a simple-is-better approach to functionality, without sacrificing design elements.
Brian Neufang's background is in sales and marketing of consumer products. He was also a producer on the Kickstarter-funded indie hit movie, "Ingenious." Our other partners/employees have extensive experience creating and sourcing successful products for national retailers, including unique houseware items, animated watches and computer accessories. 
We hope to build the business by becoming known as the small company with big time saving ideas.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Once The TravelCard™ concept was found to be feasible, we located an ultra-thin Lithium battery source. Then we methodically sought out an experienced Apple certified factory to produce The Travel Card. The Chinese factory we selected has been in business over eight years, has 450 employees and has gone through an extensive certification process to become Apple MFI (Made for iPhone) 6.0 licensed. Apple approved our factory's initial design prototype in November 2013. The final step in the approval process will be Apple signing off on a production sample and issuing a MFI license. There is always the possibility that Apple could want modifications made before approval. But according to the head engineer at our factory, this is unlikely since Apple has already approved the design. Our factory has had a close working relationship with Apple, having produced over forty MFI products.

We feel we've allowed ample time for pre-production, and once production is under way, we are confident that our factory has the capacity to keep up with demand.

Manufacturing delays could occur, but our sources tell us our factory is very reliable. We believe this to be the case or they wouldn't be Apple certified.

Shipping to our backers around the world in a timely manner presents a challenge because of the increased restrictions on products with batteries. However, our fulfillment center has extensive experience in dealing with worldwide carriers to minimize any delays.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content: We'd like to apologize to everyone for the recent broken promises regarding delivery. Our factory had some unexpected delays on components. The lightning version shipment of TravelCards just came in and look great.  We will be shipping today and tomorrow. Thanks for your patience and support.

Hello Backers,
The first three USB colors - black, blue and silver - shipped the end of last week.  
To charge your phone, simply insert the TravelCard's charging cable into your phone's micro USB port and press the power button located on the side.
To charge the TravelCard, plug the enclosed USB charging cord into the TravelCard and any computer.  A blue indicator light will come on (replacing the amber one) when it is fully charged.

Hello Backers,
We're happy to let you know that we will begin shipping rewards next week via air freight from Hong Kong to our California fulfillment center.  Three USB version colors - black, silver and blue - will ship first followed in 2-3 weeks by the remaining USB colors and all of the Lightning version colors.  You should allow a week to ten days from these dates to cover US Customs clearance and domestic transit time.  International backers should add another 3-5 days. We're looking forward to getting The TravelCard in your hands and receiving your feedback - The TravelCard cases look great. Thanks again for your support.

Several backers have expressed interest in seeing the new colors again before
they make their selection(s) on the survey. Here you go.

Hello Backers, 
We've had a lot of inquiries regarding how to order additional units. We're glad to announce that our Kickstarter backers can now preorder additional units at 20% off the regular retail price of $45. Simply enter the promo code ksbackers20 on the order page of our website at travelcardcharger.com
Your card will not be charged until the order ships and we will combine the Kickstarter pledge with the website order. Shipping is free for US backers and $10 total for international backers, regardless of the number of units.

We thought from the start that The TravelCard would do well, but the response has been amazing. Our heartfelt appreciation to all of our enthusiastic backers. We will keep you posted on our production progress.  Thanks again!

We've added two great new colors!  A Crimson Red, and, to show our appreciation for the enthusiastic support from the Kickstarter community, a Kickstarter Green.  Backers will have the option to select either of these colors on the survey sheet they will receive the first week in April.

project_data.project_name: TravelCard. The Smartphone Charger That Fits In Your Wallet!

campaign.story:
NEW REWARD ADDED for the last 12 hours of the campaign:
THE QUICKIE!
A small sampling of all flavors!  Only 25 available, so make it quick...
___________________________________________________
Success!!  Thank you to all who helped fab figs reach this campaign goal, and to those of you who have continued to pledge beyond the goal~  I'm not going to do a stretch goal.  With the short time limit, I don't want to over-promise on delivery for Valentine's Day.  Thank you, so much for your support!
____________________________________________________
I'll make this short, and sweet...
fab figs has been offered a few awesome retail opportunities - but needs "retail" packaging!  (for instance, there's this company that requested samples...you may have heard of them - Dean & Deluca?  Samples were sent, they enjoyed the figs, but they are not sold on the packaging).
Unless you've already tried fab figs, or have seen them online - you may not know that they come in a box... a box that you can't see into - like this:
The figs themselves are quite tasty, I'm told... "tastebud bliss," "orgasmic," "oh. my. god." are just a few quotes about the luscious dried figs filled with chocolate ganache.
I also get compliments on the packaging and logo, but Retailers are requesting that I make a change, thus allowing customers who have never had a fab fig the ability to see "what's in the box."
I've tried the clear plastic boxes - but the figs are too heavy for them.  I've looked at standard see-through lid boxes, but they aren't high enough to accommodate the figs...
The money from this campaign will be put toward the creation of custom packaging prototypes... I have some ideas that include custom inserts, new box design, and new graphics - but all of these things cost money to get the figs rolling:
new photos
new labels
new containers
new inserts 
If this campaign is successful, I expect to have the new packaging designed, created, and ready for production by May, 2014.  At that time, I'll be sure to send you all an update with the new look! 
In the meantime, please pledge and enjoy fab figs, which will arrive to you in the current box~
___________________________________________________
For your pledge to this Valentine's Day campaign, here are your rewards (outside of the box):
SWEETHEART~
 One box of 4 original fab figs.
________________________________________________
BE MY VALENTINE~
 fab figs Valentine Box - One box of 8 boozy fab figs~ featuring the amazing Eastside Distilling's "Burnside Bourbon" in the dark chocolate ganache!
____________________________________________________
LUST AT FIRST SITE~
 One box of 8 original fab figs
___________________________________________________
LOVER~
 One box of 16 original fab figs.
________________________________________________
TRUE LOVE~
 One box filled with an assortment of all of the above!
__________________________________________________
For those not familiar with kickstarter... it's really easy to pledge: just click here to find out how it works.  It's all or nothing - if the goal is not reached, you will not be charged.
Any pledges that take us beyond the goal will be used to offset the fees of the campaign, and then reserved toward the purchase of nutrition labeling and UPC codes (that may be a whole 'nother campaign!).
All postage for shipping your reward (within the US), is included with your pledge.
This campaign will end on Sunday, January 26th!  I will send you a survey when it ends, requesting your choice of flavors.
If you have any questions, or would like further information - please don't hesitate to contact me!
All my love~
Happy Valentine's Day!
fab figs products are always hand-made in small batches, using the finest natural ingredients - and are free of glutens.  All images and product names are Trademarked and Copyrighted by Heidi Epling, Owner - fab figs.

campaign.story:
From the media.
A huge thank you to everyone who helped make Nanotips possible! We know that Nanotips will be a great addition to your lives. If you missed the Kickstarter, no worries, you can buy it direct from our website at www.Nanotips.ca!
The liquid solution to your everyday problem.  If you wear gloves and own a touchscreen device, Nanotips is for you. 
What is Nanotips? It's a conductive polyamide liquid solution that can transform your ordinary gloves into touchscreen ones. Formulated using nanotechnology, Nanotips mimics the touch of human skin. It was designed with functionality and durability in mind making it great for all lifestyles. 
Why Nanotips? How many pairs of gloves do you own? How many of them are touchscreen compatible?  Nanotips is the most cost friendly and effective solution that will transform all the gloves you own into touchscreen ones.  Upgrade your existing gloves or choose from a wider selection without being limited to style, comfort, and functionality.  
Long lasting. Our formula is designed to last. Each application can last from a few weeks to a few months. It all depends on what you use your gloves for.  If it wears off, simply re-apply!
Restoring functionality. Touchscreen gloves eventually stop working from daily wear and tear. Nanotips has the ability to restore the functionality and value to these gloves.
Multiple applications. We have put enough liquid into each bottle to treat multiple gloves.  Nanotips Blue can treat an average of 15 fingers while Nanotips Black can treat up to 30!  So go ahead. Share with a friend or turn all your gloves into touchscreen gloves!
Freedom to choose. With the huge variety of gloves on the market, why should you be limited to the select few that have touchscreen compatibility? Nanotips gives you the freedom to choose the perfect glove while not having to worry about touchscreen functionality.
NANOTIPS is for everyone. From the cold winter months to the hot summer days, Nanotips is functional in every season.  Military gloves, running gloves, biking gloves, construction gloves, golfing gloves and even the thickest snowboarding and skiing gloves can now all be made touchscreen compatible. 
Winter Sports. Extremely durable and weather resistant. Nanotips will work in any weather and accept any abuse you throw at it.
Everyday. Never limit yourself to certain styles. Give yourself the freedom of choice!
Work Gloves. They don't make touchscreen work gloves because the touchscreen material would wear out too quickly. Our unique formula allows it to withstand even the roughest conditions. If it wears off, just re-apply.
On the go. Music and Lifestyle apps. Stay connected.
You might know this feeling if you ride a bike...
With simplicity and functionality in mind, we set out to create the quickest and most effective universal touchscreen upgrade ever. This formula has been created to last in any condition and takes less than 2 minutes to apply.   
APPLY
DRY
USE
We have formulated two solutions to meet your specific needs: Nanotips Blue and Nanotips Black.
NANOTIPS Blue
For use on fabrics ONLY. Nanotips Blue is designed specifically for fabrics.  This solution dries to a transparent blue which makes it practically invisible on colored fabrics. This formula soaks into the fabric creating a conductive bridge between your finger and the touchscreen device. Treats up to 15 fingers per bottle depending on material.
Nanotips Black
Nanotips Black is specifically tailored for leathers, rubbers, and other thicker materials. This formula works for all materials, however it may alter the texture of your fabric gloves. This formula can work in two ways. A) It creates a conductive layer on the surface of your glove B) It soaks into the fabric and creates a conductive bridge between the finger and the touchscreen device. Treats up to 30 fingers per bottle depending on material.
Get your exclusive Kickstarter Nanotips T-Shirt before its too late! The LAST day to pledge for T-shirts is on FEBRUARY 18, 2014 MIDNIGHT !!
DESIGN #1
DESIGN #2
**VOTE ON YOUR FAVOURITE DEISGN BEFORE 12AM TUESDAY FEBRUARY 18, 2014.** 
Our T-shirts come in a range of sizes from S-XL for men, women and children!
CREATE A STYLUS/PEN COMBO. 
Make your own stylus. Details in the updates!
CONDUCTIVE CIRCUIT
Draw and create your own circuits with Nanotips Black!
Research and Testing
We began testing different formulations that would meet our specific requirements.  We started in a garage, carefully mixing and testing each solution with Durability, Simplicity, and Functionality in mind. We came out with a product that is finally ready for the market!
Our design progression
Technical Details
Nanotips Black. Quite a bit of work has been done in the development of this product. Comprised of evenly dispersed ultra-fine conductive nanoparticles, each particle is carefully prepped and made to interlink with one another; this helps to form a conductive grid-like film on the surface of the material. Because your glove undergoes constant flex, abrasion, creasing, and natural elements, our formula allows the materials to remain in grid formation even under extreme conditions. This helps to create an evenly distributed conductive channel on the surface of your glove. 
Nanotips Blue. Comprised of evenly dispersed ultra-fine conductive nanoparticles, each particle is carefully prepped and made to interlink with one another.  These particles are suspended in a solution which allows the nanoparticles to remain chained to one another even under extreme physical stressors. When applied to fabrics, Nanotips Blue soaks into the material and effectively creates a conductive chain, bridging the gap between your finger and the touchscreen device. The sacrifice for transparency over conductivity was made for Nanotips Blue which is the reason why this solution only functions for fabrics.
Bottles. Our bottles are made from glass. We chose glass over other materials because it allows the liquid to achieve a longer shelf life as it remains sealed in the bottle. The brush is a Dupont nylon brush. Using the brush method of application means that each individual would be able to precisely apply the solution to the targeted area.
The hard part is done and the working prototype is complete. We now have a product that we feel will revolutionize this industry. We need your help to get this product to market. Our production partners are ready and we need your pledges to help initiate the first large scale production run! Jump on board as one of the founders of Nanotips. Each dollar backed will help make this product a reality! 
Manufacturing Plan
As soon as we reach our funding goal we will begin production. The total production time from the time we reach our funding goal is approximately 2.5 weeks.  The sooner we hit our goal the quicker we can get Nanotips into your hands!  
The breakdown...
>> Orders will be placed for Labels, Bottles, and Boxes. Production and shipping time for these products takes roughly 1-2 weeks.
>> Raw materials used in the formulation of the liquid will be ordered as soon as we reach our funding goal.  They are local companies which makes it convenient pick up within 5 days.
>> Once all the materials have arrived, we will begin production.  Getting Nanotips into your hands as soon as possible. 1-2 weeks.
>> The formula will be produced using a large batch method.  Every 100 grams will be thoroughly tested to ensure consistency throughout the batch.  
>> Delivery of the product will be managed by our logistics team.  We will have the product shipped out to you as soon as it is tested and ready. Shipping time 5-7 business days depending on location.
If our campaign is successful, we would like to continue our research to expand in these areas. Feel free to leave any comments or suggestions on how you would like to see our product developed!
PROSTHETIC HANDS.  During the creation of Nanotips, we had discovered that many prosthetic limbs are unable to interact with capacitive touchscreen devices. Because touchscreen technology is such an integral part of our society, daily interactions for anyone with prosthetic hands becomes a challenge. We would like to expand in this field by testing Nanotips on a variety of prosthetics; our goal is to give them the ability to easily interact with touchscreen devices. 
Jump to 3:00 to see how difficult it is to use a touchscreen device with a prosthetic.
TRANSPARENT SOLUTION.  We are constantly working towards making a fully transparent universal solution. The idea is to create a touchscreen liquid that would work with all materials and is invisible to the naked eye.
campaign.risks:

The major problems and challenges have already been worked out in the design, testing, and production of Nanotips. 

We will being manufacturing the minute we reach our funding goal. All the manufacturers are lined up and ready to go. The last piece to the puzzle is your support! Because we want to include FREE shipping for all you backers, we must work with a logistics team to figure out the quickest and most affordable way to ship this product to you. We hope to get the product to you in <1 months time from the date of when we hit our pledge goal.

campaign.story:
BRG - Gigaom - Wall Street Journal - Gizmodo - Mashable - The Telegraph - Cult of Mac - iDigital Times - Engadget - Engadget 2 - MacRumors - TheNextWeb - iLounge - AskMen - RunAroundTech - Runaroundtech 2 - Geeky Gadgets - PSFK
How To Back:
Learn more about how to back here Update #9
JUMP - The Smartphone Charger That Charges Itself
Our Frustration
We’ve all faced the frustrating issue of our smartphone running out of power, just when you want to make that call, send a message, or find where you are on a map.
We all use our smartphones constantly and running out of power between the workplace and home is an occurrence that is all too familiar: whether we forget to charge it, left the charger behind, or we’ve used it more than we realized.
Existing Solutions
From studying the market, we discovered key user needs that were not being satisfied. JUMP creates a new category of product – one that fulfills these previously ignored aspects of the user experience.
We have therefore developed a new solution: something that is thoughtful, intelligent and efficient by design.
JUMP is not just a charging cable; it also provides your smartphone with a substantial power boost wherever you are, without ever having to remember to charge it. Perfect for work, play, and travel.
JUMP Delivers
We managed to pack 800mAh into this compact form factor that weighs less than two AA batteries. This provides over 3 hours additional talk-time: more than enough time to get you out of (or into) trouble.
JUMP charges itself every time you charge your smartphone
JUMP is your everyday charging cable that syncs and charges your smartphone. The 19 inch (48 cm) cable supports high-speed data transfer.
Unlike power banks, JUMP charges automatically every time you charge your phone, giving you complete reassurance that whatever situation you are in, there’s always power in your pocket.
We developed intelligent technology called AutoCharge™ 
AutoCharge™ is an efficient circuit prioritization system that detects when the battery inside your smartphone is full, and automatically redirects the power to charge the batteries inside JUMP.
It's always ready and charged
Jump provides a significant power boost to your smartphone when you need it most.
It's compact and lightweight
JUMP fits easily in your coin pocket. (50mm x 50mm x 13.6mm)
With it’s compact size, JUMP is small enough to hold behind your phone as you call.
 JUMP is case-friendly
It even fits with the official iPhone case
We designed JUMP to be your everyday charging solution. One of the priorities was to ensure it is small and compact, no bigger than your average rolled up cable, allowing you to take it with you wherever you go.  
The cable management system enables you to carry JUMP easily and neatly; no more messy cables thrown into your pocket or bag.
Precision-engineered channels securely hold the cable, allowing you to pull out the desired length during charging, as well as fastening whilst on the go.
Intelligent design that is robust, compact and portable
Quality of the components are extremely important to us – we wanted to create a device that cannot only withstand the stresses of everyday use, but is also something that looks and feels really good.
We custom made cables from a hard-wearing resistant nylon, resulting in cables that are durable and long lasting. We wanted to use materials for the casing that would ensure strength and longevity; therefore, we selected a thermoplastic blend of PC and ABS.
This is what we have been waiting for.
Features Overview
The Design Story
Today's Working Prototype
Electrical evaluation of the first working prototypes have proven AutoCharge™ and we are confident that JUMP will provide substantial additional charge to an iPhone 5s as we move forward towards production.
Why Kickstarter 
We wanted to share JUMP, our latest product, through Kickstarter first. We recognize that Kickstarter hosts an important community: artists, innovators, and the intellectually curious. We wanted to share the background and development of JUMP with you because we value your opinions and support. We believe we have started a new product category within the portable charging market; one that we hope you would like to follow the progress of. Your support means everything to us, and all of the funding will go towards vitally important aspects of making this product a reality.
NATIVE UNION
nativeunion.com
NATIVE UNION is a creative and lifestyle brand that has received critical acclaim from the design community.
In 2013 NATIVE UNION launched SWITCH, a wireless portable speaker, conference call device and mobile phone charger. During the year it has received numerous accolades and awards including; Good Design Award, Chicago, Gold Winner of A’Design Awards, Italy and winner of Design for Asia, Hong Kong. Previous products have been awarded the Good Design Award, Tokyo, Design Plus Award, Frankfurt, iLounge, Las Vegas. At NATIVE UNION we have a track record of creating, designing and producing innovative and thoughtful products.
 Technical Specifications
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
It has taken nearly a year to be where we are today, and it has been incredibly challenging from a design and development perspective to achieve such great battery performance in a compact sleek design.

This upfront R&D has inherently reduced the amount of risks still involved in the project and we now face the final major task of bringing all the elements together, through; tooling, testing, compliance and production. 

Of course by developing and manufacturing a product with new technology, there are still risks involved. At this stage we foresee the largest of these hurdles, aside from the normal challenges involved in any development, is Made for iPhone (MFi) compliance testing and shipment of individual products around the world.

JUMP is the first MFI accessory that combines a battery and sync product and is classed as a charging cable; this puts us in new territory within the MFI certification process.

To reduce risk and challenges, we have partnered with a world-leading manufacturer of MFI products; this provides us added insurance and confidence to pass the Made for iPhone (MFI) certification. 

De-bugging the software involved in AutoCharge™ and within compliance of MFI will take further fine tuning and testing as we want the most efficient device for power vs size on the market today.

The last challenge is getting the individual product to each of our kickstarter backers – with tighter restrictions on the shipping of singular products that contain batteries around the world today. Our in-house logistics team has spent a considerable amount of time searching to find a logistics partner that has a proven track record of dealing with this issue and we believe we have greatly reduced the challenges involved.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Bella was born out of a love for good design and good food. 
The mortar and pestle crosses cultures and cuisines. It has been around in some form for thousands of years. Bella creates a modern take with a universal approach to cooking. It can be used for grinding dry spices or pounding ingredients for curries, pesto and guacamole. 
It's great for mashing baby food [I know this]
Awesome for making guacamole.
You don't have to be a cook to use Bella
Quick, easy, and fresh. You can even use Bella as a serving bowl
It is easy to handle and to clean.
We have been using the prototype for two years for everyday cooking. Friends have asked how they can get one. Kickstarter seems the best way to make it happen. This way we can meet minimum order quantities and pay for tooling.
Ergonomic
Bella's unique form allows the angle of the bowl to be adjusted to suit. It can also be picked up and held to get some extra force for grinding spices.
Balance
The weight distribution of the pestle means as well as feeling good in the hand it will balance on a bench or sit upright in the mortar. A cool accident of design.
Detail
The pestle is machined with grooves to provide extra grinding power.
Materials
The mortar is pressed from stainless steel with a moulded natural rubber base. The pestle is machined stainless steel with a bamboo handle. All parts are made from recyclable or renewable materials.
The rubber base allows for the mortar angle to be varied as well reducing impact to the bench top and providing grip.
Mojo with mojitos
 Mojo muddler and pestle. Made from bamboo
Mojo muddler and pestle. See perk #1
 CNC machined plastic prototype shown

We will be keeping you posted with updates during the process.
